Negative_Review: The swimming pool wasn t as clean as I thought it would be but everything else was amazing
Positive_Review: The staff were so nice and the breakfast was delicious and our bed was super big and super comfortable

Negative_Review: Aircon not up to the job 3 people in the room on full was still warm but hotel provided us with a fan and room did smell a bit damp otherwise perfect
Positive_Review: service was great doorman really good and receptionist also Mohan in dinning room was exceptional and location perfect for daughters graduation at Wembley

Negative_Review: Parking was more expensive than I thought although it was validated by hotel even though I left a day early was charged forv2 days stay
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and did everything possible to help The hotel is clean and the rooms spacious and beautifully decorated The location is ideal although it is out of central London there is a station close by with regular services

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: It was my second stay during my trip to london I choose to return back to the same hotel due to the beautiful treatment from the staff to the residents in the hotelso I thought it would be the best option for me to spend night in hilton prior my flight on the next day would like to thank eveyone for their assistance and warm welcoming

Negative_Review: The breakfast in the executive lounge could have been better by having hash browns so that a full English breakfast could be eaten and more choice of cereals
Positive_Review: Bed was amazingly comfortable

Negative_Review: The front desk was helpful but not what you d except for a four star hotel you will have to repeat yourselves a few times The pool was take up with an outside swimming class which were teaching small children and there was no room for a paying guest but this was the only bad points which id like to see change but i will be back thats for sure
Positive_Review: Its easy to find if you live outside of London and your traveling to wembley as its about 2 minutes walk the hotel Its very clean and the staff on the front desk are helpful

Negative_Review: Lighting was poor I was a bride getting married at the venue and wasn t given a suite after being told a few hours before that I would get it It was disappointing to not get the suite but even more disappointing to know that I didn t even get one of the rooms with better lighting on the other side which should have been common sense to the hotel
Positive_Review: The room was spacious and comfortable

Negative_Review: Can t fault it
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful and friendly beds were comfortable and love the pillows view from the room excellent very clean room love the Bar and the service

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: After long trip from Oman we arrived hilton hotel in morning time at 9 00 AM and the receptionist told us our room is ready which was something we appreciate it from the hotel management team rooms are spacious and very comfortable compare with rooms sizes in london hotels Staff are helpful and willing to offer assistance anytime breakfast was delicious and the staff working there are really supportive and smiling all the time we really had wonderful timing in there I would like to thank Mrs Daiva for her great supervision hilton wembley located in very attractive area surrounding with outlet shops and many restaurants and 10 mintue by the train to Paddington station which is another advantage As usual hilton hotels are the best in terms of professionalism of their staff I would like everyone for thier great work and keep it up with the good work

Negative_Review: The only thing that could have been better was the bed was a little hard
Positive_Review: Location was excellent only a couple of stops on the tube from central London and the rooms were large and spacious

Negative_Review: Terrible customer service in particular the bell boy who was rude The lock in one of our two rooms is spoiled
Positive_Review: The hotel is close to the Designer Outlets

Negative_Review: I was expecting a bigger room than what we had
Positive_Review: the location is very good just next to the designer outlet lots of restaurants around it as well Staff are very helpful and friendly Facilities are quite good as well Breakfast are delicious

Negative_Review: The rooms were far too hot no windows that opened and the air conditioning was appalling It was meant to go down to 18 C and it certainly was nowhere near that we were melting
Positive_Review: The Hotel was clean and tidy and the rooms were nice and big The breakfast was great

Negative_Review: The minibar fridge did not work in one room the fridge in the next room would get locked every time The sink was clogged the counter had horrible stains over all cleanliness was lacking
Positive_Review: The room was nice and quiet the bed was comfortable

Negative_Review: Basic nothing special I treated my mother to tthe visit for a family wedding celebration Time looks to have paid a toll on the company as standards improve and gaps are bridged within the hospitality industry
Positive_Review: Having stayed at H10 Meloneras Palace Gran Canaria I was hoping for a simila experience My Daughter held her 18th Celebration London Hilton after attending a show and that was excellent

Negative_Review: Again poor water pressure it can be more comfortable if the water pressure is higher Parking is very expensive I had to park in a commercial car park and paid 40 pounds each car for two days parking I feel this is a little bit pricey
Positive_Review: Got my room upgraded with my Hilton membership card Good location close to the tube station The executive lounge provides breakfast and free drink Tastes OK for free breakfast Staff are very helpful

Negative_Review: Nothing to cause annoyance The accommodation was fine
Positive_Review: It was our wedding anniversary and the staff had put Swan shaped towels out and petals on the bed which was lovely Great and kind service

Negative_Review: The breakfast was a bit of a let down but it had good selection of food and relatively cheap The porter wasn t really helpful and was on phone all the time during the collection
Positive_Review: It was a comfortable stay nice room and bathroom Many outlets bars and restaurants nearby which was very convenient

Negative_Review: Brekkie Buffet Not Large Enough For A 5 Star Spread Cld Have Been Better Probably You guys Shld Waive Off The Charges For Water Btls After All It s Just Water
Positive_Review: Toilets Were Clean Rooms Were Pleasent

Negative_Review: Price For big events this is very expensive vs room size quality
Positive_Review: Great hotel for Wembley location cannot be better friendly staff and nice room

Negative_Review: A staff member walked into my room whilst i was naked and did exactly the same to my brother who was in a different room on the same day she was part of the house keeping team knocked the door lightly and let herself in rather than ask if anyone was in I was quite shaken and embarrassed There was also a big ball of blonde hair on the carpet in our room when we checked in It matched with the color of the carpet so was maybe difficult to see
Positive_Review: The way the manager delt with my concerns

Negative_Review: Not a lot really forgot our swimming stuff though so couldn t use the pool our fault not the hotels but will make sure I have them next time
Positive_Review: The Executive room was lovely and definitely made our weekend Great location within easy reach of the tube lines and of course Wembley Wembley arena Would highly recommend this hotel

Negative_Review: I thought we were getting an executive suite that over looked the stadium We actually looked out over the shopping centre The Suite was not what I would expect for the cost of the room This was a standard room with extra fittings We only had 1 comfortable chair between us The term suite was not how would classify this room
Positive_Review: All the facilities were great The location was exactly what we wanted as we had planned to see Adele

Negative_Review: The executive lounge was very crowded in the evening
Positive_Review: We arrived at the hotel early and were able to check in right away They also gave us late check out when we requested it Asked reception to bring up some champagne flutes which they did with no problem The breakfast was great and we enjoyed using the health club facilities

Negative_Review: The beds were the only complaint we had We had to change rooms because our bed was so uncomfortable but the matter was delt with quickly and effectively and as mentioned previously the staff were absolutely delightful Yes the first bed we were given was uncomfortable but Hilton really was fantastic in resolving the problem We are very happy customers and we would thoroughly recommend this hotel
Positive_Review: The staff were incredibly helpful and friendly One member of staff in particular Janade was absolutely fantastic So friendly and helpful What I think is most important though is that he was human We had a laugh and it truly felt like we were talking to a person rather than a member of staff you know I love that kind of service Very happy

Negative_Review: The quality of breakfast and room service was mediocre at best That such a prominent hotel did not have its own car park or did not cover the cost in full of the local car park
Positive_Review: The location was very convenient for access to the tube Room was spacious

Negative_Review: It was very expensive and for us it was just very poor value for money we only booked one night there because we were due to go to concert at Wembley The view from our window was of a corrugated wall about two meters away There was three smallish bottles approx 500ml of water which you had to pay 2 99 each for there were no bath robes as it claimed there would be the carpet was stained in various places and the TV did not work properly There was a tray with a kettle for your tea and coffee needs but it contained three small cups three sachets of coffee three decaf coffee two teabags two lemon and ginger teabags two sachets of white sugar two brown two sweetener and three little pots milk We were not impressed we had stayed for three days beforehand at the Travelodge Stratford for half the cost of the one night at the Hilton and it was far superior spotlessly clean nothing was too much trouble and you did not have to pay for the extra things We would definitely not recommend the Hilton the Travelodge was much nicer
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Very expensive for relatively basic room Paying for location presumably
Positive_Review: Breakfast was varied and good however Husband was ill later that day and said sausages seemed undercooked Location for Wembley was perfect even though our concert was cancelled

Negative_Review: The hotel held 600 on my bank card on Wednesday and it s still being held today Monday We paid the bill in full on Thursday morning I find this very disappointing
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Breakfast was plenty of choice only thing wrong was tea was only warm not enough milk ect in room considering how much we paid price was inflated because of the concert we were there to see but overall enjoyed our stay

Negative_Review: No dressing gown slippers Bathroom dated No please make up my room sign so had to ask for service one day and woken 8am another
Positive_Review: Bed ice gym view

Negative_Review: The strong smell of liniment in the room The fact that more water came out of the shower hose than the shower head Only one small bottle of shampoo and shower gel
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: An absolute rip off Appalling service Uncomfortable bed Useless bar staff Rude and despicable behaviour from security No guarantee to get in the bars Extortionate prices for food and drink 24 70 for two glasses of very average wine Buffet only in the restaurant for 120 A complete rip off even with excellent service but the service was SHOCKING 600 for one night just the accommodation for complete GARBAGE
Positive_Review: Very little

Negative_Review: Found the selection of drinks available is limited in Skybar
Positive_Review: Staff were extremely helpful from the moment we stepped out of the taxi desk staff and concierge were fabulous Rooms were really clean and beds were very comfortable with plenty of pillows It was well stocked with kettle tea coffee etc All rooms had a hairdryer iron and air con Great unlimited breakfast with choices from the continental to full english pancakes and waffles even omelettes made to your own preference On the 9th floor is Skybar they also have a swimming pool and gym It is a great location for events at Wembley so close to shops SSE arena and much more

Negative_Review: After concert sky bar was open to all and sundry we couldn t go in executive bar as shut And getting a drink in sky bar impossible as couldn t see the bar for non residents we gave up and went to our room and got room service
Positive_Review: Nice room great view room service great

Negative_Review: Quilt rather on the thin side More TV channels fridge empty Shower a bit weak
Positive_Review: I loved the location the staff were very friendly and helpful great hotel to explore if attending events at the stadium or arena Rooms very spacious

Negative_Review: Limited bar menu as event day Hotel price high but again event at stadium so can t blame them
Positive_Review: Good room size Helpful staff Good choice at breakfast

Negative_Review: Small uncomfortable bed Basic bathroom Poor amenities in room Very over priced for what we got Very poor service in Ikons and Sky bar by overworked but under skilled staff
Positive_Review: Good location

Negative_Review: There s not parking for the hotel however There is parking next door The parking is a little expensive even though the hotel subsidise this
Positive_Review: All in all was excellent

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great area to stay plenty to do around the area for shopping and eating Short walk to the train station easy to get to the centre of London by train

Negative_Review: Being with very poor mobility the car park was a big No No as to price and location A couple of hundred yards to me is like half a mile
Positive_Review: Staff were amazing Ambience very good

Negative_Review: Shower curtain didnt stop the water flooding the bathroom as it didn t reach the floor Mini bar was empty and two bottles of water were on the table which we were charged for without knowing that there was a cost Gym was not 24 7 as the website stated
Positive_Review: Room was clean and comfortable Location was really nice Staff were friendly Breakfast and room service were good

Negative_Review: The clock radio dock in our room didn t work A member of staff attended and advised us that all the music docks had been disconnected to stop people playing music too loudly at night as they had received previous complaints It sounded like a strange excuse to me as he just went and got another one which worked and plugged it in for us Why not just remove them altogether if that really was the case
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Went to executive bar 20 mins before close No beer left Went for a swim in the morning no jets working in pool Went for breakfast no set tables no cutlery no plates They had very limited food left Staff really not sure what they were doing
Positive_Review: The bars

Negative_Review: Some of the staff were quite rude and abrupt especially the staff at breakfast because they were not happy we arrived at 15 mins before they took the breakfast off
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Went to eat in the Icons bar and although there were a few meat free options they all had cheese or mayonnaise so I had to settle for a bowl of chips of my dinner Having checked the online menu in advance and then arriving to find a reduced menu on offer severely restricted my food options
Positive_Review: Good sized room and bathroom Loved the Wembley wallpaper in the escalator area Really convenient for the stadium and the limited to the bar to residents only so we were able to enjoy a final drink after the show without it being too packed

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: From the the moment we checked in to the moment we left the following day everything was spot on The stay was amazing I ll be coming back soon

Negative_Review: The distance from central London but I guess any closer to London would have been more expensive
Positive_Review: The concierge was very friendly and understood the purpose of our trip The room was clean and comfortable The service was perfect in every wat

Negative_Review: The carpet was stained and the view poor but we were only there overnight so that didn t really affect us Also the washbasin didn t empty quickly as the plug was stuck
Positive_Review: Friendly staff Very comfortable bed The location for the SSE arena could not have been nearer The breakfast was cooked nicely and there was copious selection and the staff in the restaurant area were lovely and very attentive we did not want for anything Good to see also that we were checked by security on entering the hotel after we had been to the concert therefore we felt safer that only hotel guests were able to enter

Negative_Review: I can t complain about anything but if you really want something the air conditioning in rooms could be renewed Weather was very warm so if you need air con high it s a bit loud But in the great scheme of things it s a trivial matter just turn it down a little
Positive_Review: All the staff were very friendly You only had to pause in what you were doing and someone would ask if everything was ok and if they could help We were greeted with smiles from the moment we walked in to the moment we left Rooms were clean and well set out Bedding immaculate Bed very comfortable If this is what every Hilton is like I ll stay in more

Negative_Review: Our breakfast in bed order wasn t collected from the door handle We d paid for standard breakfast but decided on breakfast in our room There was no cooked breakfast left so Hilton offered us a complimentary pastry basket free of charge with coffee and juices
Positive_Review: The bed was huge Bath shower was amazing could have stayed in it all day

Negative_Review: Hotel said we could park in car park adjacent when we called them to book room and said there was no need to book car park On day of arrival car park was full and nowhere locally to park on event day Wifi is advertised as free but actually costs 10 for 24 hrs
Positive_Review: Location and cleanliness of hotel was great

Negative_Review: Staff where unhelpful no parking after being reassured there would be room service took a long time and when we received it the ice cream was melted and got the drink order wrong
Positive_Review: Location was good and was very clean and tidy

Negative_Review: Unable to use car park even though rang day before arriving to see if could pre book and told by Hilton staff we didn t need to So very upset when told as we hadn t booked couldn t park
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Parking facility atrocious Your site stated no need to pre book however this was not the case as an event on 2 hours spent driving round to find parking which was far out from hotel No a great experience for a lady and 5 year old Spoilt the day Hotel were no help at all Stopped off to put bags in and all they were interested in was paying for the room
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No parking was a massive issue and we got put into an disabled room without my knowledge before meaning that the facilities were extremely close to the ground and I couldn t fit in the shower because it was to low Also they didn t have free wifi and no phone reception Not ideal for the price we paid
Positive_Review: The location was great staff was friendly and the food fantastic

Negative_Review: Nothing but if I could improve anything it would be in in room air conditioning ours was noisy and the room did not really alter much it felt too warm room 608
Positive_Review: Staff friendliness ease of check in out food fantastic Rooms very clean and everything you d need Location amazing Overall fabulous stay

Negative_Review: The only problem was the hot water wasn t working properly But got sorted
Positive_Review: Everything Literally The hotel was beautiful the actual rooms was just lovely me and my partner had the best sleep ever as bed was just so comfy staff was very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: First time in a Hilton and I was not impressed The reception is a open hall not very welcoming The fixtures and fitting where badly maintained from broken lift buttons faulty standard lamps to bath shower tap handles that come off The worst was the net curtains in the room where properly filthy and the carpet stained The place needed a good clean I didn t help that the hotels theme colour is brown Also the room amenties are dated no charging USB points the television was over elaborate to use and had no on screen programme guide and programme information Also I would expect a on screen interactive service to request hotel services but no old fashion telephone ordering and handle mounted request forms for breakfast If it was not for the location quality of the bathroom and comfort of the bed I would have been unwilling to pay the bill Overall not impressed would not chose it again or any other Hilton hotel
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: Found the bar staff on a night not very nice on one visit they tried to short change us Also could be very rude Asked one night if we could have a bowel of snacks nuts or crisps said to us if you what something to eat There is a restaurant in the hotel
Positive_Review: The hotel was next to Wembley stadium which was ideal for us Also a good shopping centre next door The breakfast was great a fabulous choice of different food The reception staff very pleasant and helpful Restaurant staff also couldn t do enough for you

Negative_Review: We arrived and we were told that the car park was 50 discounted rate we were also told that we were in a disabled room as all booking com customers are put in disabled rooms We agreed as my husband had a THR op in March We placed our luggage in the room and did not look closely till later when we came back The bathroom did have a walk in shower but had a very low toilet and sink which was a problem for us There was a very small window which made the room dark and appeared drab the view was a roof basically no view at all We had a drink in the bar and tipped as always and found out a 10 service charge had been added as well Next morning we checked out and I expressed my dissatisfaction with the car park charge only to be informed that it was actually 15 I didn t get a chance to talk about our issues as the receptionist chose to talk to us with her hand which is extremely rude and demonstrates that she was not listening The car park was a multi storey with a narrow exit which we only just got out of there were scrapes and broken tiles on the way out Would definately not stay there again or recommend to others
Positive_Review: Not a lot

Negative_Review: Generally speaking prices for room service prices at the bar the restaurant in room entertainment are expensive which would put me off staying for longer or make me think about eating outside the resort Also why do Hilton hotels insist on charging for wifi it s 2017 for goodness sake I think guests would enjoy it more if at every opportunity they weren t asked to empty their wallets
Positive_Review: Buffet breakfast is always exciting at any Hilton I ve stayed at and it was no different here Staff were very attentive at breakfast I was offered a coffee refil three times and orange juice brought to my table plates were promptly swept away just as I d finished using them Food was excellent tasty and good quality Think every member of staff I walked past greeted me with good morning Couldn t ask for a better location to visit Wembley stadium Parking was 15 as guest otherwise 85 View from sky bar over Wembley was brilliant 6 a pint in the bar plus service so not cheap but ok as a one off treat

Negative_Review: Staff Some were polite but upon entering we felt very intimidated by the women checking us in No one informed us we would need photo identification nothing on booking com or an email just a letter on their front desk Food was a let down Expensive to say the least and tiny portions Ended up with food poisoning on our first night and continued untill Wednesday Bed was hard and sheets really rough same with the pillows thought we had a big double bed but turned out it was two singles pushed together Wifi READ THE SMALL PRINT Only free for 1hour then you get charged no mentioning this when giving us the wifi code so very misleading
Positive_Review: Big modern hotel which is right next to wembley stadium Has restraunts and a cinema in walking distance of hotel

Negative_Review: The bed was very noisy and it was rather difficult to get comfy We had 2 drinks that came up to 28 60 I thought that was a rip off and out of a plastic cup
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: I found the reception staff a little difficult to deal with but especially the security staff during the evening
Positive_Review: Eventually the room was fine and the facilities were very good

Negative_Review: Room not ready on arrival too many security checks on entering bars etc especially involving the quizzing of my 16 year old son I accept security was required on the main doors but once inside the hotel as residents we should have been allowed to enjoy the facilities without being subject to continuous scrutiny
Positive_Review: location

Negative_Review: Air con in room is rubbish and the rooms are so warm The car parking is surpose to be in with the price that s why I picked the hotel Only 50 of the 85 for 24 hours is complementary had to pay 35 at the payment machine to get out of the car park The staff at the hotel told me it was free parking when I checked in and when I checked out
Positive_Review: Going to Wembley great hotel

Negative_Review: I did not like the fact that after paying 245 for a one night stay there were so many additional costs that you wouldn t expect when paying so much for a room for one night and which are also usually included these days in most hotels A couple of examples being 9 95 for basic wifi and a 5 tray charge for room service the tray charge seems to be a means for the hotel to take away any tip from the the staff who deliver the room service as I would normally give the room service staff a tip directly I very much dislike this practice which I have seen becoming more common in some restaurants and hotels I was also very shocked when we asked for one glass of Prosecco in the bar on the 3rd floor and were told this would cost 10 45 The glass was tiny and needless to say we did not entertain paying such a price this was a brazen example of a business taking advantage of a captive audience I E knowing there would be a large amount of guests due to the fa Cup Final In my opinion these inflated prices reflect very badly on Hilton as a company and such treatment of their guests smacks of greed and opportunism
Positive_Review: The location was perfect for attending the fa Cup Final which was the purpose of our visit The room was a good size and was clean and comfortable The food we had was of a good standard both room service and breakfast Staff were friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast buffet very good service Exceptionally robust security arrangements for getting into the hotel and returning Also the internal hotel security was very visible in all areas I particularly liked the two bars within the Icon Bar one for residents one for public Food was available and was served very promptly so good planning ahead as this was a very busy time just following the Cup Final Would definitely stay again

Negative_Review: Not being told in advance that they were asking for photo due to security level I dont carry any as don t have a driving licence I didn t have two credit cards as only take one to large ocassions Bar staff ignored me until another customer pointed out Idbeen there before them
Positive_Review: Staff at breakfast brilliant

Negative_Review: Room service woke me up early and tried to come into the room even though check out wasn t until 12 I wasn t dressed so it s a good thing the latch was on
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Nothing to note
Positive_Review: My wife and myself stayed 2 nights at this Hotel We travelled to the Hotel in our private vehicle and parked in the Gold car park situated 50 metres from Hotel which is discounted for Hotel guests our vehicle was safe and secure The Hotel is conveniently located metres away from Wembley Stadium restaurants bars shops and public transport The Hotel was very clean comfortable our King size room was clean comfortable and quiet Staff were very friendly and professional We dined in the restaurant both evenings food was good breakfast was very good with plenty of choice Overall we enjoyed a very relaxing 2 night stay I would certainly recommend this Hotel we will definitely return in the future

Negative_Review: Air con in room was so noisy could leave it on Staff incorrectly validated car park ticket took us over 30mins to exit car park whilst hotel staff argued with car park staff Issues between Hotel and Car Park should not be addressed in front of guests and we should not have been made to wait further inconvenienced whilst the two parties argued over whose fault it was
Positive_Review: Great location

Negative_Review: Room wasn t clean lots of dust The key card to enter room kept deactiving being on 7th floor this was a big pain having to keep going down to ground floor for them to sort problem as I have problems with my health I needed to enter the room and couldn t the spa was dirty Alwful smell down there like sewage smell wasn t nice floor in changing room very dirty and pool wasn t clean either carpark we had to pay 15 as we met at hotel cost us 30 to park our cars this was never stated
Positive_Review: Bed was very comfortable

Negative_Review: Mini bar was empty I could not get a plain ham sandwich after 11pm 24hr room service sandwiches are pre made so no changes Shower over bath would prefer a walk in shower
Positive_Review: Staff are very professional and friendly The lobby and view of Wembley stadium are spectacular at night The drop off point is very handy Parking is literally next door just before the hotel drop off point entrance can t miss it and validated at a bargain price for guests The twin room we had was very quiet spotless and a decent size beds were firm but comfortable bedding was fresh clean cool and plump Bathroom was decent in size spotless fresh fluffy towels nice toiletries and water was hot Large wardrobe 3 large drawers and suitcase rack are very handy I particularly love the hairdryer dresser area with large mirror and comfy office type seat Room service breakfast was lovely highly recommend poached eggs bacon sausages hash browns decaff coffee breakfast tea croissants danish pastries served with bonne maman jam miniatures I would recommend asking for an extra jug of milk to go with tea coffee if you are ordering room service breakfast for 2 as the one supplied was not enough for us Overall we thoroughly enjoyed our restful stopover at the Hilton Wembley and would like to thank the staff in all departments for the excellent service

Negative_Review: We met up as group of 9 people in the bar before going to Wembley Stadium and on 2 out of 3 visits to the bar we were overcharged when they are already charging 6 60 for beer from plastic glasses to overcharge twice was very poor what made it worse was they said they could not refund cash and gave 2 of the ladies a free glass of Prosecco to make up for the overcharge
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Being elderly Going to a Birthday Party Didn t realise Hilton at Wembley is TOTALLY FOR SUPPORTERS FINALS ETC You can t drop off luggage So no garages 50 a day PLEASE CHECK OUT WHATS GOING ION BEFORE YOU BOOK
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Checking in was a nightmare Service at the bars was slower than reception and thats saying something Quite grumpy Obviosly it is a cash machine
Positive_Review: Nice room and breakfast but should be for the price

Negative_Review: We requested late check in and late check out received two emails email informing us that they were approved but that late check out would be subject to availability The email approving late check out was not communicated from Hilton reservations to Hilton Front desk Front desk phoned the room to see why we hadn t checked out at noon Booking com helped resolve the situation by confirming the email Outcome poor communication within Hilton departments
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Staff at the Icons Bar slow understaffed
Positive_Review: Reception staff very professional and helpful Good knowledge I didn t get ask if I was Hilton Honors which was disappointing but it was corrected when I raised it Car Parking nearby and the venue on the doorstep literally

Negative_Review: there was no proper hot water available it was little warm but almost cold water i was forced to take bath with it bathroom platform was not properly cleaned
Positive_Review: in 3 days they never change the bed cover and not proper cleaned

Negative_Review: Staff were not checking us in quick enough regardless of the fact I went to the Honours check in counter The rooms are noisy you can hear people in the corridors talking and babies crying in other rooms
Positive_Review: Great location for our conference

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The Staff are really friendly and hospitable especially Johnathan on reception he was really welcoming and let us know about things to do in the local area The breakfast is really good something for everyone and the rooms were spacious and comfy with a lovely hot shower i stayed in room 684 0

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We had a fantastic stay at the Hilton at London Wembley The staff were so pleasant and very helpful The room was kept very clean and the beds were very comfortable

Negative_Review: The wifi situation is a bit of a shame free wifi for 60 minutes for one use is a bit stingy Considering the quality of the hotel and the professional level of service you would expect the basic amenities like wifi to be readily available so that was a little bit disappointing luckily I had a dongle with me which was expensed through work
Positive_Review: The staff were super friendly and very informative I checked into the M by Montcalm yesterday evening and even though the room was much more expensive the staff were atrocious in comparison to the service I received at The Hilton I was very impressed and they gave me all the information I would require up front Breakfast was very good fantastic choice of food and all available when you book breakfast a pet peeve is when hotels charge to different prices for continental and English breakfast so the set up at The Hilton was superb

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The room was light and airy Also very comfortable It s was our second stay with you and both experiences Very good The restaurant was good and the food excellent Also your gluten free choice was good

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: After staying there recently for a boxing event we were really pleased with this hotel The staff were really helpful and friendly food was beautiful service was always so quick and efficient even with how busy it was because of the event everywhere was so clean and tidy all the time and the room had everything you needed They couldn t of done anymore to make our stay any better Perfect

Negative_Review: he view out the window was very dull and of a roof top and another hotel or possibly other rooms within Hilton I did say it was an anniversary hoping for a nice view room but still got this room not the biggest of issues as we not in the room much
Positive_Review: The bed room was very large and very clean the staff were friendly and the location was perfect for shopping food and leisure transport links were very good

Negative_Review: All good as you would expect from Hilton no complaints at all
Positive_Review: Excellent overall Comfortable clean room Good bar food and breakfast All as you would expect from Hilton and great value as there were no football games or music gigs at the stadium

Negative_Review: A minor point I m not an officienado but coffee at the hotel is abysmal Don t know if it s the water but don t bother making coffee in the room as it s undrinkable The coffee at breakfast isn t much better
Positive_Review: Perfect location for an event at Wembley Stadium or Arena Parking next door is great 15 per night but pretty good for London and especially if there s something on

Negative_Review: Receptionist was rude on arrival the booking system for the Association restaurant did not reflect what was happening on event day
Positive_Review: Pillows were comfy plenty of hot water

Negative_Review: There was a problem that left me a little rattled but it was resolved by the employees manager
Positive_Review: Convenient Location to Wembley Stadium metro Very courteous and helpful

Negative_Review: Went for a pre dinner drink at the bar No waiter service so had to go up to bar and wait to be served The charged 10 service charge Found this out when given the receipt Also served my gin and tonic in a plastic glass Not what I expected for a Hilton hotel
Positive_Review: Room was very clean and comfortable Breakfast was very good with plenty options Hotel very very handy for Wembley stadium

Negative_Review: The manager was rude not believing I had lounge access for what reason I don t no When showed him on my phone he then radioed to see if my room had lounge access I took offence to this
Positive_Review: All staff was lovely and very helpful

Negative_Review: The shower head was broken and the water went all the floor the sink pipe was also leaking and i didnt notice till i finished washing my face and slipped i then proceeded to mop up to the water with the towels there was no note of this equiptment not working properly Tables were dusty i have hayfever and ended up sneezing for most of the night
Positive_Review: The view and breakfast were nice

Negative_Review: having to pay 309 for the room when a day before it was 190 I will not be using booking com again and I will also be advising other people not to either
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The bed very comfy The size of the room breakfast great variety Got upgraded for free with no trouble As I accidentally booked online a disabled room when that was not needed and I wished for a high floor room

Negative_Review: Paying for water The room was very drying there was a bottle of water in the room which we could purchase I would not recommend drinking from the tap yuk Hydration should be a basic in a hotel of this standard Also the double bed was very uncomfortable I think every spring in it was gone
Positive_Review: The buffet breakfast was well worth the money excellent variety

Negative_Review: Car Parking Pricey and Payment confusing Unexpected Long Corridors to access room
Positive_Review: Comfortable Clean Room Close to Stadium Close Parking Exec Rooms access to Exec Lounge

Negative_Review: Parking issues is the reason I won t return Hair in my saucer for coffee Sloppy service from staff over breakfast Dated rooms and corridors
Positive_Review: Size of room Spacious Lovely breakfast spread

Negative_Review: Having to get the refrigerator unlocked upon getting to the hotel as well as having to request the remote be delivered to the room Wifi also was inconsistent
Positive_Review: Clean well decorated very accommodating Breakfast was delicious

Negative_Review: Aircon did not work but was fixed during our stay The pool area can be improved by adding some noise reduction enlarge the sauna and separate the jacuzzi so it could be hot now it was too cold Signs from the tube to the hotel could help first visitors Note that it is a 700 m walk from the tube Wembley Park station
Positive_Review: Clean large room Comfy beds Great breakfast Large inhouse pool Helpful staff Absolutely worth a few extra minutes with the tube to and from central London take the Metropolitan line it s faster than Jubilee line

Negative_Review: Only disappointment is the Sky Bar on the top floor wasn t open during the day
Positive_Review: Excellent location for use of the Wembley stadium and Sse Arena Parking is available almost right next door at a discount price of 15 for 24 hours Plenty of restaurants nearby and right next to designer outlet retail park Wembley train station a minute walk away and Wembley tube a few minutes walk away The hotel was very classy and the staff were very friendly and helpful I will stay here every time I visit Wembley from now on

Negative_Review: I m not used to staying in hotels in London very often but for the price we paid I would expect an inclusive breakfast
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable and bigger than expected room was very clean and tidy All the staff I dealt with were friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: The only thing I would say was the pool could have been slightly bigger with the steam room in service
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel and parking was perfect when visiting London to watch the rugby game at Wembley and the shopping outlet and restaurants next door was brilliant We loved the room and the entrance it s was beautiful The breakfast which was included within the price was amazing along with the amazing view of Wembley stadium We would 1000 stay again whenever we visit London again

Negative_Review: The 35 a head dinner very poor food kept warm for a long time so dried out fish soggy veg and mushey pasta dishes then over charged by 8 00 Not Good
Positive_Review: The room and location

Negative_Review: Bed was uncomfortable upgraded to executive lounge however breakfast items were limited and all cooked food was cold Complained but staff member didn t seem bothered Won t be staying again
Positive_Review: Room was a fair size and decent tv and bathroom facilities

Negative_Review: The rooms were way to hot Air con was rubbish and no fresh air cuz no windows open Staff were asked many times for a fan and only half way through the stay they actually brought us one The shower head was broken and toilet was leaking
Positive_Review: Bathroom was nice

Negative_Review: Wine too expensive Noisy air conditioning as it was warm in the night could not turn on
Positive_Review: Great staff and good site Evening and breakfast meals very good

Negative_Review: The minibar was empty when we arrived so we put our own bottles of water in when we returned to the room the minibar was locked why
Positive_Review: Easy access to central London Plenty of bars restaurants shops and a cinema nearby ideal for families with older teens Excellent breakfast

Negative_Review: Rude receptionist at check in housekeeping rudely waited outside room and demanded to know what time we were checking out room was poorly decorated with mould in bathroom holes hooks in the walls wallpaper coming off and dips in the floor likely to cause injury to drunk people Large bed not comfortable at all and Wembley stadium view was a quite a poor one from what we could see of it anyway the window was embarrassingly dirty Unstocked mini bar couldn t even see through the door s peep hole because it was dirty Lock on bathroom door was also missing seemingly pulled off High price low quality
Positive_Review: Nice view but still could ve been improved good location

Negative_Review: We were disappointed that we couldn t go to the 9th floor terrace bar without prior booking which wasn t clear in advance
Positive_Review: It was a perfect location for our visit to Wembley Stadium The room was very good and spacious and the 3rd floor bar was excellent

Negative_Review: If the hotel provided larger beds as the standard size for single occupants and the executive twins there would be no better place to stay
Positive_Review: The staff are excellent Every single member were polite courteous and went that extra mile to improve our stay The security were great to talk too and not intimidating at all The bar staff were always happy to help and had good sense of humors particular recognition to Angelo at the Sky Bar who was a real pleasure to engage with and a top chap I must stress how impressive the service is here as this is the only reason i am giving a review

Negative_Review: The woman who dealt with my check in was miserable She was not friendly at all and I felt that as a guest she was rude Perhaps if she didn t want to be in the reception dealing with people another job would suit her
Positive_Review: The hotel looked amazing clean and very comfortable I attended an event there and it finished late The staff late at night was courteous professional and efficient Very impressed with them

Negative_Review: Air vents right outside the door along the corridor was really noisy so couldnt sleep told the staff they brought us earplugs but just wasnt expecting that to happen
Positive_Review: Breakfast buffet was really amazing service plenty of food and options available

Negative_Review: The breakfast needs to be cooked more Runny eggs are not good It was practically raw Fried or scrambled The sausages wasn t cooked properly either My partner had a upset stomach later on in the day Was disappointed so didn t eat anything in the end
Positive_Review: Room was very nice and clean Lovely size and quite comfortable

Negative_Review: Staff not very nice or kind probably becuase there were too many people checking in on the day No slippers provided Tap of the shower got rosty and very hard to be turned on off Not worth the name of Hilton or the price overall
Positive_Review: The hotel looks newly built furnished comfortable bed and delicioius breakfast right next to wembley stadium and 10 min to underground so good location

Negative_Review: Neither I nor my husband were able to call my family from the bedroom we stayed in both mobiles one Vodafone and O2 could not connect to a line
Positive_Review: Good location if you are attending a concert game etc

Negative_Review: Almost everything 1 We asked for a quiet room when we made the booking but we got a room closest to the elevator 2 Bathroom had a bad smell smelled like bad bacon and the staff initially refuses to clean it again by saying that it s just chemical smell 3 Temperature is cold inside the room This hotel s AC s max temp is 24 Celcius in reality 22 Celcius and there is no heater in the bathroom which makes taking shower a very painful experience my girlfriend caught a cold because the temperature in the bathroom is too cold 4 After my girlfriend caught a cold we decided to leave the hotel on the next day we booked for a two day stay originally and the reception refuses to give a refund due to 24 hour cancellation policy 5 The hotel is also short staffed which makes all the staff super busy and anxious the house keeper was super angry at something and talked angrily and loudly on her phone to someone when she did the housekeeping
Positive_Review: We went to see a Jay Chou concert in Wembley Arena and Hilton Wembley is the closest hotel But besides the location monopoly there is nothing else that fits a 4 star hotel

Negative_Review: It s too hot in the room even we turn off the heater
Positive_Review: The facility in the hotel The location is very good for events and shopping goers Plenty of restaurants nearby too

Negative_Review: The hotel was really bad to give a simple invoice and they were not interested to organize this simple procedure either I am dissapointed with hilton This is such a shame for them
Positive_Review: Breakfast was really good for england

Negative_Review: None
Positive_Review: Next to Wembley SSE Arena 5 minutes walk to Wembley Park tube station Lots of restaurants at London Designer Outlet next door All staffs are friendly Comfortable bed and clean room

Negative_Review: Very slow wifi shower hose leaked badly no socket for phone charger next to bed
Positive_Review: Stylish decor very helpful staff nice dinner in the Icon bar Sky Bar has good view

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We have stayed here on a few occasions and have always enjoyed it Love the location fantastic staff all over the hotel loved that we got upgraded to a executive room with a view of the stadium

Negative_Review: the wifi was the only issue hardly able to get connection and signal in general wasnt very good i didnt want to have to leave the room for it but 30 mins free isnt really worth using
Positive_Review: The welcoming once we got to the hotel was great my son loves this hotel the hotel was busy for check in but it was to be expected as it was around 14 30 but we were dealt with pretty swiftly our room was a high floor and had a stadium view hotel was spotless the staff friendly and helpful cheerful the leisure facilities are always a pleasure to use without a doubt next time im off to an event at wembley arena or wembley stadium i will be staying here again A firm favourite and cant wait till the next time

Negative_Review: The Swimming pool was cold steam room and sauna was over crowed Our room was lovely apart from the air con wasn t working and didn t get dealt with until 2am and then was told to move to another room
Positive_Review: Great location and the staff was super Breakfast was nice and the hotel was very clean

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Location of the hotel was exactly what we need as we were seeing a show at the SSE Wembley Arena which is literally next door Gold Parking lot has a deal with the hotel that you only pay 15 for the parking when staying at the hotel instead of 70

Negative_Review: Unfortunately that s where the good bits end Staff were shocking don t think any of them had ever encountered cup final day before Sky Bar was shut and that was sole reason we booked this specific hotel Restaurant was apparently fully booked for lunch and yet tables were empty and we wouldn t get any lunch All in all it was utter rubbish in the hotel itself just easy to get to the stadium was its only plus point
Positive_Review: location next to the stadium was brilliant

Negative_Review: The bar staff are slow and totally overwhelmed by the number of customers they get They should ask Wetherspoon s for some training
Positive_Review: Next door to Wembley arena

Negative_Review: Bar was so busy after a show there was no where to sit and bar was 4 deep with people waiting took 10 minutes to get lift as we were told by door man there was no stairs Gave up and went to bed
Positive_Review: Comfy room staff were great

Negative_Review: Could have had a few more milks coffees etc in the room
Positive_Review: Extremely comfortable bed pillows All linen and towels were exceptional The reception staff were really helpful and the breakfast selection was excellent Situation is perfect for the Wembley Arena

Negative_Review: Long wait for lifts when is was busy Lifts did not move for a long time even when there were queues only one lift at a time arrived in the lobby and others did not move
Positive_Review: Location perfect for all Wembley events View from room attached We were there for the Andre Rieu concert at the SSE Arena so the hotel was very busy Andre Rieu and the orchestra were also staying at the hotel Inclusive guest WiFi is excellent

Negative_Review: The room was very hot when we arrived so we turned they air con up When it got colder it did not seem to be coming back on though it was set to Did not bother me as I like a cool bedroom might have bothered others That is all
Positive_Review: I was given an upgrade when I arrived the room had a view grate The relaxed atmosphere the staff every where in the hotel were so welcoming and friendly and polite also very helpful I love staying here as it is so convenient for all the concerts and shows that take place in the SSE ARENA My friend and I have now stayed with you for the last four concert trips and once just for lunch when on a coach trip We can not fault anything for us it is the perfect place to stay We are always telling our fiends the same We usually go into the bar for a snack and a drink when we arrive so we can relax after the train ride not keen on the underground always book dinner which is always up to a very high standard even on event nights I can not say much else I just love staying with you and so does my friend Will be back in December for another Andre Rieu concert all being well the next morning after a late night it is good we do not have to rush for breakfast as that sets us up for the day and there are so many different dishes to choose from we have fun choosing every thing cooked to perfection then its back home to wait for the next trip Thank you so much for being there to give us a most enjoyable time

Negative_Review: Bit impersonal Very pricey on drinks Sky garden closed Was disappointed with that Didn t have cocktail menus So busy after concert couldn t get a seat
Positive_Review: Comfortable clean room Loved breakfast and restaurant Lovely waiter in there

Negative_Review: The shower Water pressure is not strong enough
Positive_Review: If they can provide a little bit more in the room would be even better such slipper tooth brush and toothpaste

Negative_Review: When I booked on line it said that the parking was 15 per day When we arrived at the hotel we asked where to park and we were directed to the car park where we were charged 35 per day which we thought was very expensive
Positive_Review: The staff were friendly The rooms were clean and comfortable

Negative_Review: I have no complaints
Positive_Review: Restaurant staff very courteous Breakfast variety and quality were superb My room was spacious and tastefully designed The pool was welcomed if a little crowded

Negative_Review: Air con didn t feel like it was working as well was quite chilly
Positive_Review: The view as well as the layout and comfort of room was great Staff was very helpful and polite

Negative_Review: a little confusing on how to get in and out of car park signage needs to be improved for vehicle exit and pedestrian exit for hotel I thought I was going to set off the fire alarms using the fire door
Positive_Review: great deal including breakfast can t fault location for Wembley stadium left my car in car park for conference and up to 24hrs they will validate your ticket for 15 Breakfast amazing choice too

Negative_Review: Disappointed with service in late night bar after shift changeover our bottle held behind the bar in the wine cooler with our room no marked on it was conveniently misplaced and they tried to fob us off with a cheaper drink until I made a fuss Soured an otherwise very enjoyable weekend
Positive_Review: I arrived with one more guest than had been booked for the room and Reception notified Housekeeping of this within 20 minutes an extra bed had been delivered and set up in the room Excellent service could not fault it

Negative_Review: When booked I asked for two beds and only got one also when trying to sleep I had two people knocking on the door for payment for a meal which I had already opened a account when booking in
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: sky bar was closed prior top kick off and that was main reason we chose this hotel staff were awful and looked like they had never experienced a cup final day ever before Restaurant was fully booked for lunch and yet we arrived at 11 30 and attempted a booking immediately Specifically requested early check in between 11 12 when I booked and yet rooms were not ready until after 2pm All in all it was disgraceful for the Hilton brand that we expect a certain level of service from and yet it was one of the most awful hotels and service I have ever had
Positive_Review: closeness to the stadium

Negative_Review: communication with booking com was nothing short of a disgrace seems like hotel and booking com have no form of communication would not book again through this platform
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Most of the staff were really friendly but some could smile more
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel for Wembley stadium is superb It is just a stone throw away from the stadium excellent for all occasions

Negative_Review: The smell was horrible and was lurking all day and night car parking described as 15 for the day but if you needed to take the car out in between you had to pay more As well as this the car park barrier in the morning when we were leaving wasnt working leaving us over an hour late to our next destination I could have just parked in the open car park at the top of the road which was 10 all day and you could come in and out at anytime as it was pay and display
Positive_Review: The bath tub and large windows

Negative_Review: Prices in the sky bar
Positive_Review: Approximity to Wembley stadium very good 2 minute walk excellent staff very friendly excellent facilities well worth upgrade to executive lounge

Positive_Review: The location is brilliant for our night out to see Jack Whitehall show plus just a short walk from Wembley Park Tube The designer outlet was a hit with my daughter and we enjoyed lunch in one of a huge variety of restaurants Our room was overlooking the Wembley stadium we had a good nights sleep comfortable beds lots hot water for shower and baths everything spotless We ordered room service in the evening which was quick to arrive and delicious All the staff we met were polite cheerful and helpful Definitely stay again

Negative_Review: Considering we paid for a room with a view we were put on the 4th floor and I would have thought we would have been put much height i e 7th 9th floor
Positive_Review: What made me book this hotel was the fact that it has a rooftop bar a swimming pool and it s close to great retail outlets The pictures online do not do the hotel enough justice The beds were extremely comfortable haven t slept so well in ages The bathroom looked very nice although the shower temperature kept rising on and off when showering which was slightly dangerous The breakfast was great they make fresh omelettes right in front of you The swimming pool was great although we saw a couple of plasters floating around should definitely be more monitored

Negative_Review: The breakfast could of been better everything was luke warm and had to wait a while to get a coffee
Positive_Review: The best night sleep I have had in a while The bed was so comfortable just what I needed after travelling and being out all night

Negative_Review: No Negative

Negative_Review: Sky bar closed when we were told as long as there were enough people it would remain open The event finished very late and only allowed a small time to have a drink There were dozens of guest who would like to have remained for a longer time to relax and enjoy the facility

Negative_Review: Nothing I didn t like
Positive_Review: Loved everything about the place brilliant hotel and very polite and helpful staff Defiantly looking to book again in the near future Excellent location next to the shopping outlet and plenty of places to choose for food

Negative_Review: Could have been a little more drawer space in the room fine for a weekend but would have struggled if stopping a week
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable and the receptionist we dealt with was pleasant knowledgeable and helpful

Negative_Review: Couldn t really see the difference between the guest room and the deluxe
Positive_Review: The reception staff were very accommodating very quick to solve all queries Good service and a gorgeous nights sleep in a very large comfy bed

Negative_Review: When I was sleeping the cleaner disturb me I meant to check out at 12 but the come to knock at 11 o clock
Positive_Review: I like the room the hotel was nice the breakfast was good as well the Internet wasn t working on my phone

Negative_Review: The prices in the bar are rather high
Positive_Review: The staff are amazing nothing is too much trouble and the rooms are so comfortable This is my 4th visit and I will be back

Negative_Review: Had to pay a ridiculous amount for a breakfast 32 for 2 people Even though the breakfast was lovely you still can t justify the 16 each price tag

Negative_Review: Not a lot not to like really my fianc was a little disappointed that they do not do cocktails when the is an event on in the stadium arena
Positive_Review: Extremely helpful and polite staff Clean and comfortable room

Negative_Review: No hand soap in bathroom Wifi is only free for an hour in your room then it is charged The kettle tea coffee etc were hidden a way in a drawer wasn t that easy to find
Positive_Review: Excellent location for either Wembley Arena or Wembley Stadium we were going to the arena and it was a 30 second walk Large clean room bathroom Comfy bed Very easy check inn with friendly staff

Negative_Review: Prices of drinks were steep but I suppose that is London for you and being charged service charge even when visiting the bar yourself You expect that if you are being waited on
Positive_Review: I loved the modern decor

Negative_Review: Cleanliness Was not very good outside our room door was crisp mass all over the carpet Ask a member of your housekeeping staff if it was possible to hoove it up as the hoover was outside as we had to walk in it to our room She shrugged Her shoulders and walk off went for a swim and in the pool was lots and lots of loose hair even walking to the steam room you had loose hair I understand you get loose hair at pools but never in my life I seen that amount couldn t stay in the pool Told pool receptionist about the problem but unfortunately I didn t understand what the lady said back plus she was more interested in talking to another member of staff As it was a special weekend as we were going to a show for our wedding anniversary we thought we would stay with yourself as the Hilton is a special place normal we wouldn t stay at the Hilton Left letter of complaints at reception desk when we left I was so looking forward to stay with you as it was our anniversary on the 17 2 we thought about making it a special weekend as I m having a full knee replacement at the beginning of next month so we decided to stay with you to make it even more special Apart from that we had a great show good food thank you
Positive_Review: Placement to what we were doing as we went to a show next door at Sse Wembley Food and drink was excellent value for money

Negative_Review: Considering the price paid we had a view of another hotel and a patch of grass not very impressive The prices are extortionate
Positive_Review: Close to the SSE arena good shops and restaurants around Good sized rooms Comfortable beds

Negative_Review: Bathroom fan was on all night didn t stop when light was off Constant humming kept me awake Not enough teabags left in room
Positive_Review: Cleanliness of the room bathroom

Negative_Review: I didn t like the bed and how the 2 single beds were joined together it gave us a really bad back pain in the Grove where both beds were joined

Negative_Review: I think l didn t like that it didn t have complementary water The bottle of water in the room was priced at 3 95 now that is a rip off Most hotels now don t charge for water
Positive_Review: The room was neat and facilities clean

Negative_Review: Wifi access I was unable to get connected however my partner did
Positive_Review: Excellent location service lifts and car parking facility Choice at breakfast was also excellent

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were really friendly and helpful The cost was not excessive especially for London The car parking we used the Gold Car Park 100 yards away only cost 15 for 24 hours excellent

Negative_Review: I was a little disappointed there wasn t a selection of pillows I prefer a firmer pillow and they were very soft
Positive_Review: The space in the room was fantastic and the selection of breakfast was brilliant too

Negative_Review: The car park charge was not seen so when I went into London for the day I came back to a surprise 30 car park charge I was not impressed local parking was significantly better value for money
Positive_Review: The staff in the restaurant catered for my autistic son who lives on pepperoni pizza without question

Negative_Review: Restaurant No bread rolls on the table or asked if we required no water on table or offered we had to ask no spoons on the table had to be asked when soup and dessert brought to table
Positive_Review: The bed was comfy the room and bathroom excellent and clean

Negative_Review: Front desk check out staff Despite asking for a print out of the bill I didn t get anything not even a credit card receipt

Negative_Review: The bed and pillows were so uncomfortable and rock solid The staff in the bar area we found to be very rude Waited over 20 minutes for service with no apologies from any staff member

Negative_Review: Air conditioning in my room this time was very noisy it wasn t so bad last time Acoustics in the restaurant are poor so you get quite a lot of noise form the adjacent escalator and other tables
Positive_Review: It s a good quality comfortable hotel

Negative_Review: Room was very very warm and despite turning down heating to lowest point still found it a little to warm and stuffy
Positive_Review: Spacious room and bed was so comfortable

Negative_Review: I would have like breakfast to be included
Positive_Review: The bed was lovely but the speakers in the bathroom were a little odd especially without the visual aspect

Negative_Review: No free WiFi which for Hilton we think is unacceptable Also the reception in the room was horrible and this was affecting of course the 3G or 4G connection The reception in the rest of the building was ok but not as expected
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable We loved the bathroom and the hidden speaker in there which was connected with the TV The breakfast was amazing

Negative_Review: parking is in a associate car park so you will need to walk up the street although it was discounted for the hotel for overnight at 15 its a good old trek to you room loooong corridors dont leave anything in your car or you will need your walking boots

Negative_Review: The voucher could have been for breakfast or the following night as eating and drinking on a fixed voucher when we needed to be fresh for monday was not desirable and rest is all we wanted thats why we booked two nights

Negative_Review: The wifi wasn t working and neither was the TV The swimming pool was alright but too small for the amount of people that were there and definitely really cold
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly especially in the restaurant we had a little problem with the food and the staff dealt with it in a very nice way and made sure we were happy The room service was good too and the room was very clean and comfortable Very good stay would definitely go again

Positive_Review: The beds were super comfy staff all very helpful and polite booked for friends 50th staff provided free bottle of bubbly and slice of birthday cake

Positive_Review: The staff couldn t of been better very helpful with travel arrangements and there local knowledge And I was unfortunate to leave a watch in my room with the staff from the hotel kindly sent to me by post

Negative_Review: The fire alarm went off and it wasn t that clear where the quickest exit was so if it wasn t for staff I may have panicked
Positive_Review: It was a lovely quiet peaceful sleep which was unexpected as we were between the SSE Arena and the stadium but a perfectly lovely place to stay with everything you could need for a stay

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff were really friendly and helpful and did everything possible to ensure we had an amazing stay It had great facilities and there were also lovely restaurants nearby

Negative_Review: We couldn t sit in the lobby as it was always full of workers on lunch Often with their feet out and they give you dirty looks it s not very inviting when you first arrive
Positive_Review: Breakfast was spot on

Negative_Review: Nothing at all it was perfect
Positive_Review: This hotel was so perfect all staff were very helpful and always smiling No words can describe how good this hotel is

Negative_Review: The noise of the air conditioning heating units in these rooms is difficult to sleep with but I guess that is the price for city living
Positive_Review: Lovely comfortable room excellent bathroom Perfect location

Negative_Review: The only thing I didn t like about the hotel was the fact that there was only limited free wifi There isn t much to do or see nearby
Positive_Review: This is an excellent location for anyone visiting Wembley arena The food was excellent and reasonably priced The bar staff were very friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The breakfast was wonderful the staff were all lovely and really welcoming very friendly The room was clean and pretty much perfect The bed was lovely best night sleep I have had in a few days The hotel was great all rounder I recommend this hotel to anyone

Negative_Review: Wi Fi did not work has done on previous stays
Positive_Review: Wonderful room as always staff treated me to a birthday bottle of bubbly great surprise after returning from a busy day out

Negative_Review: The shower and bath water were cold which was disappointing
Positive_Review: The beds were so comfy Overall the rooms are a nice size and cozy The area is lovely lots of restaurants and some decent shops around Very close to Wembley stadium

Negative_Review: Dust in some parts of the room
Positive_Review: Very friendly and helpful staff providing a fabulous very personalised service Big shout out to Stefania on the Reception desk for such a sunny welcome with a smile

Negative_Review: Would have been nice to have vege sausage option at breakfast and feel breakfast could be set out a little better
Positive_Review: lovely facilities and good sized rooms

Negative_Review: Tubes
Positive_Review: Excellent hotel with great staff only problem is went on a weekend with engineering works on both jubilee and metropolitan line which was frustrating coming from south London and Camden But other than that really want to come back

Negative_Review: We presumed that room service was 24 hours We had been to a show and had been unable to eat so returned to the hotel thinking we could get room service I rang to enquire and asked what was available for my coeliac daughter I was told the mineral water in the room was the only thing available I found this very patronising We had bought drinks from the bar to have in our room with our meal We couldn t drink them because of having no food This leads me on to what a waste of money seeing as the drinks were so expensive There was only 1 type of ros in the bar which for the quality of hotel and size of it we were disappointed My daughter asked for a snack which was listed in the bar menu She knew these were gluten free His reply was they did have them but not now This is 2017 and gluten free is something that should definitely be catered for even with snacks The temperature of the room was hard to control I could not get the temperature below 18 I also would have liked to open a window but they were non opening I did not discuss this with staff due to it being a 1 night stay only However I would have to think before booking again because I felt unwell in the morning due to the heat Reception was also very hot As a non smoker and with my daughter having a health condition affecting her breathing it was very disappointing to see how many people standing right next to the main entrance doors We had to walk through their smoke which was disgusting Seeing as our room was in fact above the street maybe it was a good thing the windows didn t open Talking of cigarette smoke When we arrived in our room we fancied a cuppa There was only 1 sugar satchet but after ringing through there was a tap on the door shortly afterwards and we were given a bag with some tea coffee etc 1 minute later there was another tap and it was a young lad who had a handful of sugar and milk We thanked him but explained we had already been sent some
Positive_Review: Amazingly comfy bed Great shower 100 cleanliness Breakfast was fantastic coeliac friendly also Staff were helpful Close to tube station

Negative_Review: There is no proper parking at the location The staff don t leave the hotel reception area to welcome you or take your luggages or ask for any help They basically just give you the room access card and that s it No one even cleaned the room the next day despite that the sign was there Technology in the room is very old fashioned a key for every single light spread around the room absolute pain
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: We ordered food from room service at 9 30pm and we hadn t eaten all day so we were starving Room service finishes at 11pm and our food was nowhere to be seen by 11 05pm I called to complain and apparently there was no record of the order ever being made but I very clearly heard my boyfriend make the order After a while on the phone complaining as everywhere would be closed by now and we were so hungry with no options we were offered complementary sandwiches and a cheese platter Better than nothing when you re so hungry Unfortunate however that the issue did arise initially I would ve expected something more organised for a Hilton
Positive_Review: The bedroom and bathroom was spotless very comfy beds I informed the hotel it was our anniversary and arrived to balloons and chocolate cake kissing towel swans and a congratulations card Very sweet

Negative_Review: The bed was like sleeping on the floor Wallpaper was peeling off the wall Shower head leaking more water than coming out of the shower Walls are paper thin hear baby screening all night Very unhappy would not recommend
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The toiletries in the bathroom were very basic and no toothpaste with them which i know is a minor but other than that the whole experience was fantastic
Positive_Review: We enjoyed the whole experience and all staff were so friendly and attentive food was delicious Facilities great

Negative_Review: Every staff member had different rules No robes and slippers were provided had to beg took over an hour to deliver to our room Be prepared to be very disappointed with the spa The entire room was covered in dust TV not accessible because of the mounting to the wall therefore can t plug in your laptop Mini bar was locked Green in between the tiles in the bathroom Have to pay for wifi 15 a night for parking Isn t this the Hilton I m certain I paid for the name and not the service
Positive_Review: Great access to shops and restaurants less than a minute walk away

Negative_Review: Couldn t fault any aspect of the stay
Positive_Review: The Hilton London Wembley was fantastic An unexpected complimentary upgrade saw us in a beautiful modern spacious room with a great view of the arena Staff were all very pleasant knowledgeable and accommodating which added to the overall experience Subsidised parking was an absolute bonus and made the travel much easier Overall really pleased with our stay and would highly recommend

Negative_Review: Parking should be free all the time for hotel customers 15 per day 45 i paid for parking after 3 days of stay
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff confortable and clean rooms Enjoyed sauna steam room and swimming pool

Negative_Review: No complaints
Positive_Review: My partner and I got engaged in London and stayed here We had a wonderful weekend in a beautiful hotel with an excellent breakfast a room upgrade and a bottle of champagne in our room to help us celebrate The staff were so friendly and all kept the surprise from me Thank you to them for making our weekend so special The location is excellent for accessing the tube especially the jubilee line which runs all night over the weekends

Negative_Review: Someone trying to enter our room hours before check out however this was resolved quickly by the hotel staff
Positive_Review: The room was fantastic and the swimming pool was perfect

Negative_Review: Although I didn t venture down to the bar in the evening the hotel felt a little soulless would be a good word Lots of memorabilia in the public areas which you might expect from a hotel which is literally a stones throw from Wembley Stadium but is somehow all felt artificial The staff were professional but not particularly warm or welcoming The major negative for me was that the disabled parking space was cordoned off apparently to discourage the general public from using it My partner who is a Paralympic athlete dropped me at the hotel She has two prosthetic legs and wanted to join me for a drink but the car park entrance is a fair walk from reception so not at all convenient t Surely the disabled parking bay is meant for the general Public who are using the hotel i e Disabled people who are dropping off picking up guests
Positive_Review: Room was comfortable bathroom exceptional

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I loved the facilities and the location it was right next to the Wembley outlet with a variety of restaurants so we didn t have to travel far Was perfect

Negative_Review: the fridge smell really bad and male member of staff in the restaurant wasn t professional
Positive_Review: fantastic staff and beautiful views great comfort for the price

Negative_Review: 1 House Keeping are the worse ever they would never do their work without complain 2 Since the room has no window to open so it was so HOT so you have to open the air condition all the time
Positive_Review: I Really liked the location to the property and All the Receptionist Staff they are really friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: The air conditioner or heating was very noisy unless it was something else underneath us
Positive_Review: The room was lovely It was clean and looked new with a nice bathroom The breakfast was very good I would stay there again

Negative_Review: Lack of smoking area where the bar was Bar was located on 3rd floor and we had to go down to the ground floor out the front to smoke leaving our drinks in the bar as not allowed to take them out I
Positive_Review: Good customer service Staff very friendly Breakfast was very good and room was excellent

Negative_Review: Long queue for breakfast at expectedly busy time as most guests will have been at an event the night before and hot food buffet not restocked very quickly Food that was there was good though
Positive_Review: Perfect location for events at Wembley stadium or arena Rooms clean and comfortable
