Negative_Review: We requested a travel cot before arrival but there was nothing on record when we arrived We asked the lady at reception for a travel cot but when we returned in the evening there was still no travel cot in the room We rang reception and a travel cot was brought to the room at half 9ish The hotel corridor smelt of cannabis and a plate of food was left on the corridor for 2 days until I reported it to reception This was outside the lifts on floor 6 Several other plates with food on was left on the corridors for several hours The beds where not comfy and on arrival to the room we found a champagne bottles cap which I d extremely dangerous for our 1 year old daughter crawling around The room was not cleaned to a high standard
Positive_Review: Location was good

Negative_Review: Room was a little cold and there were some initial issues with the booking but this was sorted at length
Positive_Review: Food was amazing and the bed was outstanding

Negative_Review: The room service phone operator was rude and the breakfast was cold when it was delivered to our room
Positive_Review: The room was beautiful and the help when we arrived with our bags etc was very good

Negative_Review: Staff at reception where have of hearing and didn t understand simple English which was very frustrating Bed comfortability wasn t the best pillows where too big and stiff
Positive_Review: The facilities where amazing and very good sized rooms

Negative_Review: It could have been better if we have requested a room that we could see outside rather than having blocked by the building in the middle of the hotel
Positive_Review: It was a great place All correct

Negative_Review: The breakfast does need some attention Not wanting to be overly critical but 5 star and serving coffee in a mug and only 1 choice of cold meat Mortadella seems rather limited Also WIFI limited to 1 hour in public areas I don t really understand the reason for this Also the connectivity in the room was okay the download rate was rather slow I would have preferred a separate shower from the bath Shower curtains always leak and make the floor slippery
Positive_Review: The room was spacious and well appointed

Negative_Review: Not there own car park price was ok as its London
Positive_Review: Hotel was easy to find Excellent hotel staff facilities out of this world breakfast was wonderful Staff very friendly helpful s much so I have already booked another stay at the same hotel

Negative_Review: The Cook making the omelettes at breakfast time said it will take 20 mins to make the omelette totally unacceptable When I went to collect it after 20 mins the cook still had not started making it
Positive_Review: The beds in the rooms were very comfortable

Negative_Review: would have liked biscuits with the tea and coffee in the room and the room was noisy with a droning noise all the time
Positive_Review: The bed very comfortable also the whole layout of the room

Negative_Review: I wasn t happy with reception staff and room never had bath and it was a suite
Positive_Review: I wasn t happy with reception staff and room never had bath and it was a suite

Negative_Review: Service in restaurant slow It took 45 mins for our main course to arrive after other tables served first even though they arrived at their table after us
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The main entrance auto turning glass doors Inconvenience if you have luggages keeps stopping
Positive_Review: Room is nice clean and spacious Located just a stone throw away from Wembley Stadium

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Lovely room hotel not easy to get to from West Sussex but that was mainly due to the rail strike unfortunately our concert was postponed so couldn t take advantage of another night

Negative_Review: The queus for breakfast were just too much You could really do with an extra egg chef on busy days too
Positive_Review: The TV has a really big variety of channels and entertainment There s a really cool speaker in the bathroom so you can leave some music on and relax in the bath

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent location close to SSE Arena Wembley stadium and the local outlet shopping centre Unbelievable value for money First class breakfast and staff who are only to happy to help Nice big rooms with comfy beds and large bathrooms Car park is by the hotel gold carpark and is only 15 for 24 hours

Negative_Review: I am completely satisfied
Positive_Review: The staff all excellent Secondly the Executive Lounge and lovely staff there especially but not only one named Maria Thirdly the room and excellent bed Fourthly the amenities Express check out Near by Shops Pool and gym sauna and steam room Quiet maybe not so quiet with view but loved silence Lifts very fast Probably left off something Close to public transport into central London

Negative_Review: We had pre paid for breakfast and when we went down to get breakfast at 10 25hrs we were told that breakfast stopped being served at 10 00hrs which was a real disappointment I was sure the reception had said breakfast was served until 11 00hrs That said the person we spoke to in the restaurant rustled us up coffee and croissants and some danish pastries so while it wasn t the cooked breakfast I was looking forward to it certainly left us feeling a little better
Positive_Review: The location was perfect for a night at Arena Wembley The facilities were great and the staff were helpful We used the car park 15 for overnight parking for hotel guests not too bad when the price is 40 for non residents We went in to the hotel bar after the gig which was friendly and helped to extend a good night out

Negative_Review: Room directly above the bar made for a difficult time getting to sleep until the music was turned down
Positive_Review: Spacious room good burger in Icons bar Perfect location for a gig at SSE Arena

Negative_Review: We had been put in an upgraded room disabled room The shower was for wheelchair users and bed was smaller than expected When we were moved into our original room it was great but I had to complain to get this I couldn t understand why this happened
Positive_Review: The breakfast was really good and great value for money

Negative_Review: N A
Positive_Review: The view from the bar overlooking Wembley stadium even in the dark was breathtaking 5 minute walk from tube 30 second walk to wembley arena Memorabilia displayed on walls from past visitors

Negative_Review: Some rooms miles from lifts only about 3rd of exec rooms actually have decent view of stadium
Positive_Review: Lovely welcome given champagne in our room for daughters birthday Great location for shopping and the arena Pool and gym great and exec lounge very good

Negative_Review: the staff completely ruined my birthday night told me the boxing would be on and when we arrived all ready it was not showing I then had no time to do anything else which made me furious The down stairs in the hotel was far to rowdy me and my girlfriend wanted a quiet weekend away and there was loads of drunken people and the noise level was ridiculous
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Phone constantly ringing at 7am due system fault Poor signposts to red car park so parking charges were high
Positive_Review: close to London Outlet comfortable rooms good breakfast

Negative_Review: The second night with X factor personnel staying at the hotel I was denied entry to the hotel as I was wearing jeans and a t shirt and a Santa hat as I had been a guest at the royal Albert hall On my return to the hotel the entrance was cordoned off due to somebody called Sharon Osborn being in the hotel lobby I had to wait over 20 minutes for security to eventually say if you are actually a guest you should have a key card I showed him my key card and eventually he let me in Then once entering the hotel was stopped again by X factor staff wanting to know why I was coming into the hotel I had to show my key card again to prove I was a guest My second evening was ruined by staff at the Hilton Wembley and security staff
Positive_Review: First night was fine second night was a nightmare as some staff and judges from the X factor were staying in the hotel

Negative_Review: Living Well needs a refurbish the facility compared to the rest of the hotel is very tired
Positive_Review: Excellent Customer service from all the staff even when under pressure on busy X Factor weekend

Negative_Review: I couldn t sleep till 2am ish It was too noisy complained with reception but did not resolved Room was dusty Shower splashed water everywhere Room is small so was the window No sleeper no ears buds no shaver or comb uncomfortable bed Low standard for a 4 5 star 165 night I am not happy Glass was oily and washed badly
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Overall everything was perfect Was very impressed with the bed decor setup requested for being newly wed The breakfast in bed service was also fantastic and delicious

Negative_Review: Hard to get into hotel after the football game as there was security in place Even though I had already checked in
Positive_Review: Very close to Wembley stadium Ideal

Negative_Review: Had to wait too long to be served at the bar and the drinks were a bit pricey
Positive_Review: Great location and a pleasurable stay The breakfast was good with attentive staff

Negative_Review: The only thing we wanted to complain about more my hubby than me but the hotel bar ran out of Guinness but he got over it
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel staff very friendly helpful definitely staying there again whenever we attend a gig at Wembley

Negative_Review: Couldn t use the sky lounge it is closed for private parties Would have liked to have used it
Positive_Review: Great hotel fabulous lobby very handy for the SSE arena great pool

Negative_Review: Reception staff very unhelpful and very poor attitude in respect of parking which is up the adjacent road and not clearly marked but was made to feel like i should have known and not guided clearly by a rude receptionist
Positive_Review: Bed was very comfy

Negative_Review: Bed was hard bathroom wet room pretty much flooded when showering a wedding party was distinctly audible into the early hours parking is extortionate even with validation from the hotel I ve stayed in Premier Inns that are better than this for half the price
Positive_Review: Good location

Negative_Review: The bath hadn t been cleaned at all after the last guest Unfortunately we didn t realise until gone midnight so didn t ring housekeeping and cleaned it ourselves We went down for breakfast before half ten and didn t get seated thanks to a long queue until 10 45 We had a cooked breakfast but the juices pastries and fruit had been cleared by the time we wanted them at 11 10 Breakfast stops at 11 there were only 4 wait staff on duty not nearly enough as were needed to clear the tables and seat people before the sitting ended We ended up after a 20 discretionary discount paying over 200 to stay in a room with a dirty bath and to miss half our breakfast Appalling value and understaffed
Positive_Review: Location Next door to Wembley arena and stadium and 5 minutes or so from Wembley Park tube

Negative_Review: No Tv s in bar area showing England V Australia rugby
Positive_Review: Perfect location to see concert at SSE Arena Bed very comfy Great discount on parking only 15 for 24 hours

Negative_Review: The scramble eyes very strange taste Staff double booking our room very inconvenient
Positive_Review: The choices that can be made re the egg cooking station The buffet style breakfast is an excellent way to cater for everyone

Negative_Review: the loud bass from the disco two floors below us No free wifi What hotel in 2016 doesn t offer free wifi Traveled all over the world and have never found a hotel until now that didn t offer basic free wifi Breakfast was bland and tasteless and lacked staff to restock the buffet breakfast The scrambled egg made from powder was not nice in anyway
Positive_Review: Location is good hotel is very clean and impressive in decoration

Negative_Review: All fine no complaints
Positive_Review: Everything the room and bathroom were well equipped the shower had a flexy hose not the wall mounted type TV and WIFI were great I was upgraded to the Club Lounge which was cool with good finger food and beverages The Club breakfast second to none too We also parked next to hotel and got a good discount on an Event day

Negative_Review: Expensive Very mean with tea coffee in room just 2 sachets coffee 4 milks especially at 179 a night
Positive_Review: Very convenient for Wembley Arena Nice breakfast Comfy room

Negative_Review: Only thing that annoyed me was the tv sound being on in the bathroom Didn t see the point in that
Positive_Review: Got us an early check in really friendly staff Room was great comfy big bed

Negative_Review: Room standard Deluxe King was advertised but there were only guest rooms We ended up in a twin single bed room after paying for deluxe King room To watch movies we were directed to call reception for a code We called throughout the night and the only person who picked the phone dropped the phone on us The mini bar wouldn t open The bin wouldn t open What was supposed to be a dirty weekend ended up as a nightmare
Positive_Review: Cleanliness

Negative_Review: Staff didn t have any 5 pound notes in the bar till so said they d bring change over 20 minutes later the arena emptied so the bar got extra busy Result is that 5 pounds not passed on and 2 bottles of beer cost 20 Ridiculous
Positive_Review: Great bed blackout curtains and a fabulous sleep

Negative_Review: We arrived late and room service finished at 11 which was fine the the out of hours menu was very poor
Positive_Review: Loved the room size and the breakfast staff were fantastic

Negative_Review: The bar was understaffed we waited a long time to be served the first time and they had no Baileys We returning later in the evening we gave up trying to get a drink and there was no seat s if we could have got one
Positive_Review: We like the location as we had to go to the arena

Negative_Review: There were not enough staff on duty meaning that queuing was a feature of the stay Given that there was a function on at Wembley Arena on the Friday night there was just not enough staff in the bar We waited around 25 minutes to be served when we ordered drinks a pizza and a burger The lady serving us was excellent however instead of ordering 2 or 3 drinks we only had one lost business We queued for breakfast and then queued to settle our bill Like the people behind us who said we have never queued so much in a Hilton Hotel
Positive_Review: The staff who were on duty were polite and courteous

Negative_Review: Going to London Central took us an hour every day going and coming back whether we used the underground or cabs
Positive_Review: The Designer Outlet is just few steps away where you could find many good restaurants and shops Nike M S and others The area around the Wembley Stadium is open and nice to walk Supermarkets and Wembley Park Station can be reached within 5 minutes walk

Negative_Review: Only 2 complaints when you upgrade to stay on the executive floors the rooms are no different to the others What you get is the lounge access and at 40 extra a night not sure it s worth it Alcohol can only be consumed there for 2 hours a day so 40 a day for a water and coke seems a little daft Could do with some extras in the room to make it stand out 2nd thing the shower was a little poor for the price of the room
Positive_Review: Hotel is lovely staff excellent so helpful I have stayed a few times now would highly reccomend Car park price good

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The whole experience being at this hotel was excellent with comfort class design and so close to all amenities excellent staff and service I would highly recommend this hotel to everyone

Negative_Review: Couldn t eat at restaurant yet lots of empty tables So had to eat at the bar wine was very expensive Food was excellent When we left there was still a lot of empty tables in the restaurant
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful Location was superb Bar food was excellent

Negative_Review: The bar drinks selection was a little disappointing for a Hilton
Positive_Review: Excellent staff perfect location for visit to Wembley had a fantastic night Thank you Hilton

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We found the staff to be very helpful and polite the room was spotless as was the rest of the hotel the breakfast was a large selection and very pleasant staff to help

Negative_Review: 1 Receptionists were terrible The only lady there was keep talking on the phone and nobody gave me any help or attention It seems that they are interns or trainees from a hotel school lack of experience and skills I understand that people need time to learn and practice but I also believe that to ensure the quality of service a supervisor should be around 2 The receptionists again After checked in I found that I was not told the wifi password normally they would indicate me at other Hilton hotels I called the reception three times the first two calls were not answered I waited long enough And I also asked for extra shampoo and dental sets I asked for two dental sets but they only sent me one they said in 5min but actually sent in 25min I had to call them again and after another 20min they finally sent me the second set It was really late already and I had to keep myself awake to wait for them 3 The water pressure for the shower was really low not comfortable at all water was not hot enough neither 4 You can not get into the hotel from the car park they provided I understand this and this is a minor problem
Positive_Review: The price was reasonable location is fine not far from a tube station The main hall was interesting got lots of signed sports jerseys The hotel is close to a designer outlet and many restaurants Got convenient stores opened till late

Negative_Review: No bathroom on ground floor
Positive_Review: Gorgeous breakfast really special Loved the pool sauna and steam room The actual room was beautifully spacious and the bed extra comfy

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We stayed at this hotel as we were going to the England match excellent location easy to walk to central station and was able to get around London on the tubes the hotel was clean pleasant staff and amazing breakfast

Negative_Review: The car park was expensive The service room was fair for a 4 hotel The fitted sheet in the bed was torn for a 4 hotel No welcome snacks in the room Tiny shower gel for a couple No free wi fi for a 4 hotel
Positive_Review: The location is near Wembley stadium

Negative_Review: That the breakfast option was not to be had on line unfortunately if I needed to be in the area again despite being my first choice I would have no choice but to look elsewhere
Positive_Review: The perfect location Staff were very helpful and efficient

Negative_Review: Where does one begin Booked an Executive Corner Suite for a nice little treat for our stay and to a show Great view but that s about it Our room took what seemed an eternity to be released then we were never contacted as promised so after the long wait decided to go to reception Eventually got our room First off we noticed only one dressing gown with no slippers as we started to shower then decided to look around to see what else was amiss Pulled back the sheets and to our horror found pubic hairs and dirty footprints on the bed sheets on further investigation there were several stains on pillows cases and sheets Also the Cup covers were also used and dirty Complained and was given another similar room similar being the operative word we were basically given a Downgrade Complained again to the Manager who proceeded to argue that this new room was not a downgrade At this point I invited the Manager to come up and compare the two rooms he declined and then after some heated conversations was given a third room This room was ok but by then the damage was done we were late getting ready for our show and put a damper on the whole stay The food and drinks in the Executive lounge was not up to the Standard of the Waldorf in Aldwych so we were all in all very disappointed with our stay We were offered a discount on our room which we accepted To make matters worse the reception took two amounts off of my debit card The original booking fee and the subsequent discounted fee followed by more phone calls and arguments only to be told that they cannot refund the fee until several days later so everyone beware of this procedure as I am not into funding loan Mr Hilton with my hard earned cash for free Still awaiting some form of an apology by email guess we have got a long wait All in all not a pleasant experience for our nice little break
Positive_Review: Location was great that was about it

Negative_Review: that we was a resident and we had to pay more for the dinner because I didn t book in advance Reason I didn t book in advance is because I couldn t guarantee the traffic
Positive_Review: There was a great atmosphere

Negative_Review: Cards locked us out of our room twice only to b told on the third time that we should not keep them next to mobile phones
Positive_Review: Beds are comfy facilities excellent

Negative_Review: Shower water pressure was a bit weak Bar prices are quite high
Positive_Review: Comfortable big beds luxurious quality in the rooms Overall considering the location it s reasonable value for money

Negative_Review: Room was freezing despite turning heating right up Walk in shower soaked the whole bathroom Tea at breakfast luke warm
Positive_Review: Freindly staff but not paticularly helpful

Negative_Review: No Toothpaste or Toothbrush but other fancy hair net Conditioner etc also no bathrobe or Slippers to go to pool and sauna
Positive_Review: Very big room nice and spacious

Negative_Review: These are observations not ve s for the hotel 3 95 for the in room water mini bar not stocked have to ask so fridge unit locked Be a little careful of the various tube over ground stations serving the area they re all Wembley something but you can pick the wrong one
Positive_Review: Very excellent hotel overall good staff Location good

Negative_Review: Light switches There wasn t one main switch for all lights I had to go round the room turning off all the lights that had been put on for me Not a big deal but a little annoying when you know the likes of Premier Inn or Travelodge even have this
Positive_Review: The bed was fantastically comfortable I could have laid in all day Great view of Wembley Stadium from my room as well Breakfast was lovely too The staff in the restaurant were very nice and looked after my work case whilst I had breakfast

Negative_Review: There were not enough staff working in the dining room during breakfast The tables were messy there was a shortage of glasses plates etc and some of the cooked food was cold as it had been there a while
Positive_Review: Bedroom was very comfortable with good facilities

Negative_Review: 4 for water no fruit or cookie no wifi Dirty plates sat outside neighbouring room until 11am from the night before
Positive_Review: Staff friendly Location brilliant Good gym and pool

Negative_Review: Had to trundle down 7 floors to reception for more coffee and sugar supplies for the room having made only one cup each as there was no reply from housekeeping Slightly annoying first thing in the morning
Positive_Review: Bed amazing room a good size clean and comfortable

Negative_Review: Disappointed that the Sky Bar closed early despite being told several times that it would be open after dinner
Positive_Review: Lovely room great meal in the restaurant and ideal location for Wembley Stadium

Negative_Review: We were not aware there was such a good shopping centre near by It was fabulous Best to tell people
Positive_Review: Location was perfect 5 mins from tube 2 mins from Wembley 2 mins from shopping centre

Negative_Review: I was at the Spurs game at wembley and they couldn t cope with the volume of customers wanting drinks The management of the bars were running around without a plan They are opposite Wembley so if anyone should be organised it should be them Drinks prices were really overpriced even for London
Positive_Review: Rooms were lovely and the beds are comfortable There were some biscuit crumbs though at the side of the bed that weren t cleaned from last occupants

Negative_Review: Room wasn t clean enough hair in the bathroom and in the carpet Tv low quality lack of the channels no HD 60 of the channels aren t working No EU plug only in the bathroom The hotel is for the international travelers so it is time to forget the UK plug Wifi complicated too much information is needed to use it
Positive_Review: Close to Wembley stadium very friendly reception staff breakfast is fine

Negative_Review: I spoke to the receptionist stating if it was possibility to have food taken to the room as i m a diabetic and not had the best night She stated clearly that this was not possible and not part of the company policy I had then when to the 3rd floor and asked the lady at the serving area and explained my situation and she was happy to help me out i Found it was noisy in the late evening The football match was on so i would recommend just to check who is playing one another
Positive_Review: I like that you can park overnight for 15 This was at Gold Car Park which was a minute walk from the Hotel I liked the comfort of the hotel room I liked how tidy and clean the room was I like the lighting in the room The room had a fridge in was a bonus to keep my medication and my drinks cool Hotel close to the Wembley Outlet and 2 minute walk to the Underground station

Negative_Review: We checked in at 11 00am as we were there to watch the NFL Both rooms signed the paperwork however we were never asked for a credit card details for room extras which seems to be normal practice They did look after our luggage though and gave a receipt Unfortunately when we came back that night they had no record of one of the rooms being reserved This was very frustrating especially as we had already done the checking in process that morning We never got our luggage that night either but had to go down to reception in the morning to collect it ourself Not happy
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Didn t get the Room I originally booked which was dissapointing Prices in the bar a result very steep Over 6 at the bar for a drink and then a service charge on top Not good
Positive_Review: Great clean room airy and comfortable Staff all friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great venue for the stadium we were there for an event Plenty of eating options nearby Easy to get to from centre of London Hotel was clean generally pleasant

Negative_Review: My room was opposite the lift which from my experience tells me lots of noise as every person from every room will walk past Classed as an Executive room I would call it a normal room As expected the room was very noisy The sound of chairs dragging on a hard floor which tells me there was a staff room nearby This woke me both mornings 5am on the first morning Not good
Positive_Review: I travel a great deal and stay in many hotels across the world Thus in comparison my stay was ok at best

Negative_Review: The only thing I disliked was the fact the mini fridge in the room was not prestocked with soft drinks but I understand different hotels have different policies and it wouldn t stop me coming back in the future I needed a drink late at night and felt it an inconvenience to call rooms service for a soda and asy daughter was asleep I didn t want to leave the room to get it
Positive_Review: The staff were all so friendly and helpful my daughter loved the pool and everything was so easily accessible

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The bed was extremely comfy and rooms spotless Breakfast was excellent On arrival there was a little confusion as they could not find our booking however this was immediately rectified and the manager sent pots of tea biscuits and cakes to the room as a little gesture which was very much appreciated

Negative_Review: I didn t have a mobile phone signal in room 417 but when I was moved to room 412 facing Wembley stadium the signal from O2 was much better The staff moved without any fuss I would have liked hooks to hang up my pyjamas to air them A non slip mat or rug outside the bath would be a good thing
Positive_Review: The hotel and staff made me feel special

Negative_Review: No free wifi other than one complimentary hour In 2016 wifi is available in supermarkets coffee shops transport it should be free in a Hilton hotel
Positive_Review: Staff pleasant Efficiency Quiet Clean Breakfast great

Negative_Review: Long walk 0 5 km and many many steps up to Wembley Park underground for mature visitors Wembley is far out 12 tube stops from London West end etc
Positive_Review: Beds v comfortable great bathroom very convenient to London Designer outlet Shops 2 good supermarkets within walking distance convenient car park with hotel concession rates nice swimming pool free to residents

Negative_Review: Would have like a room with a view
Positive_Review: The staff were so helpful and kind Paulo is an asset to the Hilton lovely chap would definitely come again but would like a room with a view

Negative_Review: Room service quite expensive ok without the tray cost
Positive_Review: The location next to the arena the friendly staff members the food was perfect if a little expensive and the room really clean and comfortable

Negative_Review: The prices of the food mini bar was extortionate Toiletries could have done with being bigger as you only get 2 uses from them and there was 2 of us who showered on both days we were there Also put an instructions manual for the TV as we couldn t find the TV Guide The speed of service when checking in could be improved however was okay
Positive_Review: The pillows were super comfortable and the bath felt luxurious I LOVE that you could leave your bags there to collect later after checkout as me and my friend had an event to attend that evening as well and we had done some shopping throughout the day Very close to amenities which was really good and excellent views from the window

Negative_Review: The staff is totally untrained and not compitant To get in touch with room service it took me 15 minutes to contact as nobody was picking up the phone We don t know this is a effect of ressession may be less staff or This hotel is managed very badly The lady on the reception doesn t know what is Amex platinum card I will not recommend this property to any one
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: WiFi reception was poor in room 411
Positive_Review: Have stayed at hotel previously Liked the location and the hotel Used it as a Base to see London The bedrooms are clean and spacious and the bed was comfortable

Negative_Review: There is an extra 5 for every room service call which mounted up We ended up getting our own food after many calls so we dont keep getting charged anymore than we had already Despite being in a double room there was only one set of toiletries
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful

Negative_Review: On arriving at our room we found that the bathroom was without a shower curtain I feel that if we had not have mentioned it to the reception staff it we could have had an accident
Positive_Review: On arrival at the hotel we were given a room with a view of the stadium which was good

Negative_Review: Checking in the receptionist needed help from a colleague and then couldn t find my Hilton Honors account despite me giving her the number She seemed generally bored and not too interested in welcoming guests In an Executive room for 2 people we had one bathrobe Called housekeeping 3 times before I could get through and general reception twice always engaged Said they would bring one up Never did The lamp next to my bed wasn t working as the bulb had gone As it was around 10 30pm and after the fiasco with the bathrobe didn t seem worth bothering to try and get this sorted out In the bathroom out of 2 bath sheets one was new and fluffy and one old and worn odd to leave two such disparate towels and so obvious one was ready for throwing out This stay was disappointing especially as it was a treat for a friends birthday and It felt like no one had an eye on the fine detail I expect better at 175 a night
Positive_Review: Second stay here and very convenient for the Stadium and Arena Buffet breakfast is very good The women working in the Executive Lounge were friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: The fact that you can not unload luggage and told its high security when anybody can walk in and go to floors obviously this just an excuse not to hire porters
Positive_Review: Positin and restaurant

Negative_Review: Would have liked the sky bar to have been open
Positive_Review: Huge bed modern room with lovely en suite Breakfast catered for all with a great selection of food and value for money Very friendly staff

Negative_Review: Car park was too expensive You have to pay 15 everytime you leave the car park after 2 hours Not ideal if you would like to go out for meals or events and return backo
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly

Negative_Review: Breakfast was included after an upgrade I got but I wasn t allowed to go into the restaurant and had to eat at the bar At the checkout the manager told me it should have been included
Positive_Review: The room was good as always

Negative_Review: Only downside was no shower curtain in the bathroom everything else was superb
Positive_Review: Check in was swift efficient and friendly Room was cleaned to within an inch of its life Bar staff very friendly Photos show door to door Hilton Hotel to sse Arena

Negative_Review: Being picky here but using 1 pillow was too low for me and using 2 was too high and gave me neckache
Positive_Review: Literally about 12 steps from hotel to SSE Wembley Arena Breakfast choice was great Everything was absolutely perfect staff room location food

Negative_Review: Some staff weren t very good had to wait for ages in bar for drinks They closed the bar early dinner was inconsistent There 4 of us for dinner 1 meal was fantastic 2 were lukewarm and the other was inedible
Positive_Review: Comfy bed Big room Breakfast very good

Negative_Review: Bedside electrical sockets were not live so could not charge mobile Bedside clock radio dead so could not use alarm
Positive_Review: 9th floor lounge facilities Proximity to stadium and arena

Negative_Review: Not a very comfortable bed because of the obvious rush after the arena closed there should have been more staff at the bar 25 minute wait to order two drinks and the kitchen should have stayed open for a little longer Room service menu was very limited with only pre made sandwiches so if you don t like mayo you go hungry
Positive_Review: Excellent location next to Wembley Arena Reception staff very helpful Great overnight deal with the Gold car park next door

Negative_Review: The fact that we had only booked for 1 night
Positive_Review: Exceptionally helpful and friendly staff nothing was too much trouble Bed was so comfy and room had everything we needed Luxury at a great price

Negative_Review: Just the pillows but asked at reception for different ones and they came within ten minutes
Positive_Review: Lovely friendly staff nothing to much trouble great for watching seasick steve concert and in walking distance to shoping centre and tube station and the breakfast was amazing will be coming back again next year

Negative_Review: If making use of the affiliated car park bring a small car The bathroom sink and tap arrangement is a bit odd Suggest whoever designed this set up be nominated for the Turner prize as it would look good with a stuffed shark in it and wouldn t make it any more ridiculous Operating instructions for the aircon in the info pack please
Positive_Review: The room was clean and well appointed facilities in the hotel are good and the staff helpful breakfast is excellent Ideally placed for the Arena will definitely book when next going to a show Also very close proximity to numerous restaurants so great for grabbing a meal before the show

Negative_Review: to have known that we needed the gold parking on arriving and that the ticket would be discounted on check out would have been useful to know without having to ask at reception when we arrived with the car in limbo
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The Gold car park next door is very ackward to maneuver especially for big cars so be careful
Positive_Review: Good location friendly helpful reception staff and cleanliness The Gold car park next door is convenient and one hour parking is free through hotel authorisation

Negative_Review: The accessible facilities room only had one small double bed and the hotel unable to make this a twin room whereas all other rooms can be either twin or double This was a problem as twin had been ordered two brothers The bar staff were incredible slow both at around 6pm and then later around 11 15pm Plenty of staff on duty but no organisation by manager and so some of us waited over 10 minutes to be served whereas other people were served much more quickly Even when this was very politely pointed out staff still continued to serve one side of bar and ignored people on other side This was a shame as breakfast staff and restaurant staff were so much better
Positive_Review: Location next to SSE arena brilliant meal at hotel before show and drinks afterwards Breakfast was excellent a really varied selection of things to choose from Meal in restaurant previous evening was also very good

Negative_Review: The fact I was put in a room above a very loud function which resulted in me having to call front of house twice as my 4year old couldn t sleep I should have been put on a higher floor as staff were aware this function was taking place Also no phone signal in the room given add to that 9 99 for 24hrs Wi Fi every other hotel if stayed in its been free and 11 50 for a kids movie As of yet the noise complaint still hasn t been dealt with Not happy with the service given
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: There was a fake eyelash imbedded into one of the towels and I found that no matter how I used the shower it just soaked the floor
Positive_Review: Room looked very clean and was very comfy It s a great location for the SSE Arena

Negative_Review: Service was not very quick both in the bar and breakfast The bar was very small for the number of guests and minimal staff Also very expensive
Positive_Review: Excellent location for Wembley arena Comfortable and spacious room

Negative_Review: Everything was great
Positive_Review: Excellent location for concert at Wembley arena super comfortable bed large room superb facilities Will definitely be staying again

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I was travelling on my own and had booked a twin room but was upgraded to a double free of charge Parking next to hotel reasonsably priced for London and secure and well lit Staff very helpful

Negative_Review: The air conditioning was too noisey to have on during the night and the window didn t open so the room got way too stuffy The staff at breakfast were less than attentive we were sat at an unpaid table and had to ask for cutlery They had no dairy free alternatives which meant my husband had a hearty breakfast of melon Not great I thought Hilton was up there with Marriott but apparently it s not as good as travel lodge
Positive_Review: Excellent location as we were going to a concert at Wembley arena

Negative_Review: The room seemed to be equipped for one rather than two in that it had only one easy chair at the table and one dressing gown
Positive_Review: Literally a few yards from Wembley Arena and Stadium We had an Executive room More expensive but with free food and drinks in the lounge and an excellent breakfast it was good value we felt After a gig at the Arena we were home and in the bar in under 5 minutes

Negative_Review: I had no connection on my phone and when i tried to connect to Wifi it didn t work so i had to always always go all the way downstairs to make calls or answer messages Also I was a bit disappointed with the view from our room The view was just Rocks on the floor and nothing else
Positive_Review: The bathroom was very nice and the bed was super comfortable The TV has more channels then other hotels so you can just watch movies at night if you want

Negative_Review: The breakfast was a major let down compared to other Hilton hotels I ve stayed in over the years Toaster machine needs to be replaced due to 4 attempts to get any sort of colour on my toast Stock levels on various items were never topped up Apple juice was non existent had to ask 4 members of staff for butter by which time my toast was stone cold Staff don t understand the concept of stock rotation as when topping the stock of sausages bacon scrambled eggs etc all the new stock was dumped on top of the stock that had been sitting there for a while If anybody left it till late for there breakfast they could be eating food that had sat there for hours Not the Hilton standards I m used to
Positive_Review: The whole experience was spot on with our stay

Negative_Review: GOT THE HUMP WITH THE BOUNCERS ATTITUDE ON THE THIRD FLOOR BAR
Positive_Review: STAFF WERE GREAT BUT THE BOUNCERS ON THE THIRD FLOOR WERE TAKING THE P OUT OF ME IM DISABLED NOT DEAF

Negative_Review: Housekeeping walked in twice without knocking First on our arrival asking what we we doing in the room Secondly following morning when we were getting ready to leave On our return in evening found Keycard did not work late in the night and had to go down 7 floors to get it resolved only to find a couple trying our door who seemed drunk
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: On match day the only food on offer in the restuarant was a buffet at a fixed price of 50 per person absolutely ridiculous
Positive_Review: Wide variety of breakfast items and a specially made soya porridge for my partner with a great view of Wembley stadium from the restuarant

Negative_Review: I had some Issues with my card being pre auth The funds were available from the 7th 350 for my two rooms When I arrived they said they were able to take 145 room 1 but not the 205 room 2 When I spoke to my bank they said 2 payments of 145 was authorised The hotel said they tried to auth 145 but this declined so they tried it again and it worked This meant i was 145 down I managed to pay the 205 but I am still unsure why the hotel said this had declined but my bank said these payments were authorised
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Could improve check in process but not a major problem
Positive_Review: Excellent location across road from Wembley stadium and Arena Friendly staff with excellent customer service

Negative_Review: No hot choc in tea making facilities Drinks served in plastic cups It s a Hilton Charge 4 for water in the room thought a still water would be included
Positive_Review: The speaker in the bathroom and excellent location for Wembley Also the rooms are very nice for a basic

Negative_Review: More T bags and fresh milk would be nice
Positive_Review: The bed was huge and soft and aaahhhh so were the pillows just gorgeous Great view with a comfy chair by the window and handy table Loved the large TV Bathroom facilities were superb

Negative_Review: Room had not been cleaned and even though we informed reception of this nothing was done to rectify Safe for valuables didn t work
Positive_Review: Location was excellent rooms were spacious breakfast was excellent

Negative_Review: NOTHING
Positive_Review: On arrival we got upgraded not sure why but overwhelmed We received excellent service The staff all very friendly I have already recommended the Hilton at Wembley as members of my family regularly visit that area

Negative_Review: earlier breakfast for early departures ie pre 7 00am
Positive_Review: proximity to Wembley stadium restaurants easy to get to from St Pancras International Train Station Eurostar

Negative_Review: Asked for high floor got level 4 We booked the deluxe king room room was at a good standard but what you see in most hotels so unsure what made it deluxe
Positive_Review: Good location great reception sky bar and icons bar were great

Negative_Review: The tv took a while to connect but apart from that all was very good
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful and friendly Great choice of films in the room and the bed was huge

Negative_Review: Not the comfiest of beds we booked a king suite had to wait 25 mins to get served in the bar after a concert at wembley under staffed
Positive_Review: Excellent location for wembley stadium arena

Negative_Review: Being dragged out of bed at 1 30 pm for a fire alarm that took nearly an hour before we could get back in our rooms No fun being left outside on a chilly night without many clothes on and very little information from staff about progress or where to stand
Positive_Review: The bed was excellent and the bathroom facilities very good when we could use them

Negative_Review: We had left a parcel and when we rang up about it We was fob off and told to call back and talk to housekeeper Not what we expected from the Hilton
Positive_Review: We liked the staff some where vary helpful others not

Negative_Review: No tea or coffee facilities in the room or complementary water snacks like all other hotels we have stayed Dental kits arent great with horrible tasting toothpaste that still leaves your teeth feeling dirty Considering it is a hilton hotel we expected it to be much better than any other hotel we ve stayed at Next time we would definitely choose the crowne plaza again over the hilton Not a great experience
Positive_Review: Location was good and look of the hotel was very nice

Negative_Review: A bit out of the way however the links to central London are very convenient
Positive_Review: We arrived in the morning and the staff was very accommodating with our early check in The hotel is stunning the rooms are large with plenty of storage space comfortable large bed and beautiful bathroom The value for money was excellent and I would definitely come back there again

Negative_Review: Lifts difficult to access with the number of people arriving all at the same time but not the Hotels fault
Positive_Review: The Executive Lounge was great Nice quiet area with brilliant view Excellent facilities included in price of room

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Quick check in upon arrival Upgrade to suite an unexpected surprise So very close to Wembley Stadium Just overall perfect We had a false alarm fire evacuation during the 2nd night which for the size of the hotel was handled very professionally

Negative_Review: there was nothing
Positive_Review: The bed was extremely comfortable and there was no noise from the corridor even when the hotel was very busy We had a great nights sleep The staff in the bar were very helpful when we asked about dining and even reserved us a table since we could not get into the restaurant The reception staff were very welcoming And the breakfast well what can I say it was amazing

Negative_Review: The hotel could do with brighting up as I found the corridors dull and the dark coloured carpets looked well worn
Positive_Review: Everything was right nearby the Wembley Stadium Areana and the Shops All in walking distance

Negative_Review: Lifts were very busy but our room could not be accessed via the stairs keycard didn t work in the doors from the stairs
Positive_Review: Friendly staff and clean comfortable rooms Spurious fire alarm at silly o clock in the morning was resolved very quickly and staff handed out bottles of water and space blankets whilst we were waiting outside

Negative_Review: Nothing even the midnight fire evacuation was dealt with efficiently and did not detract from our overall great experience
Positive_Review: Location was great Staff in all areas were so friendly and helpful but particularly consierge beds super comfy and breakfast excellent Parking easy and good value for the area

Negative_Review: Being woken up at midnight for a fire alarm and waiting outside in the freezing cold for half an hour and then being let back in without an explanation or apology from any staff at the time Also housekeeping tried to come in our room when the do not disturb sign was on the door
Positive_Review: Great room overlooking the stadium Fantastic breakfast buffet

Negative_Review: we had to wait 20 minutes over our original check in time before our room was available We then discovered that it was a twin room not a double as was booked on line When I spoke with the receptionist she informed me that we had booked a twin I said no it was a double She then replied a double room is the same as a twin It s not A twin room usually has two single beds A double has a double bed We were moved to a double room which was basically two single beds pushed together with King size bedding on it There was also no assistance with our luggage after check in
Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed Spacious room Clean but not up to the usual Hilton standards I m afraid

Negative_Review: There was no Bluetooth speaker in the room other chains I use offer this in rooms of this price free wifi was slow and a little unreliable limited number of coffee and milk in the room
Positive_Review: As a reasonably new hotel it was clean and tidy with a modern feel Well situated for the restaurants in the London Outlet Shopping Centre

Negative_Review: That you have to pay 5 to use the mini bar and you have to pay to go to the sky bar etc
Positive_Review: Loved everything about the hotel but the breakfast was not worth the amount I spent for it the scrambled eggs were terrible but the rest of the breakfast was lovely just expensive

Negative_Review: The window in the room does not open The toilet was filthy with urine and hair I had a headache for 2 nights with no air in the room We were told we had a lovely view we didn t One member of staff was very rude at the breakfast serving
Positive_Review: The London outlet next door

Negative_Review: Bit far out after midnight when the tube closed its a pricey taxi ride
Positive_Review: Good quiet hotel good quality good breakfast good pool and spa area variety of restaurants close by

Negative_Review: Wi Fi didn t work and complicated should be simple to use Breakfast wasn t great with not enough staff and had to ask to refill food etc the music and decor was dull and staff looked dis interested Asked for a coffee for way home after breakfast and had no top to stop coffee spilling
Positive_Review: Location was great and reception staff very helpful Had a late night food in the bar upstairs and Food was great and so were staff Room was ok but shower wasn t working properly with water escaping from shower head When we went for breakfast we had to walk past someone s sick in the corridor which no one had cleaned up from previous evening

Negative_Review: The pool could have been heated and the drinks a little cheaper in the hotel bar
Positive_Review: The service was superb and the hotel offered everything we desired from our stay

Negative_Review: Not much to dislike except the view from the window there wasn t one It was expensive for one night but it was a treat
Positive_Review: Proximity to Wembley stadium couldn t be better we were attending a concert at the stadium It is a lovely hotel

Negative_Review: The drinks in the bar were ridiculously priced 26 for a large wine and double whisky lemonade The pool is so much smaller than the photo looks Also disappointing to have a kids swimming lesson going on whilst using the pool hardly relaxing Also had to queue a little while on arrival but a guy in a suit clearly someone on a business trip or convention was asked if he needed help and was able to jump the queue
Positive_Review: Lovely room and bathroom quiet clean Nice sauna and steam room Fine for what we needed Loved the designer shopping outlet and the restaurants nearby

Negative_Review: No hotel parking Paid parking near by but 15 to go in and out each time
Positive_Review: Location is great Friendly staff and great service Clean and comfortable room

Negative_Review: Family rooms from 551 to 565 or so has internal view to the wall Should be same on 6th floor
Positive_Review: Perfect location right in front Wembley stadium next door to SSE arena and within 7 8min walking to Wembley Park underground station

Negative_Review: Noise from banging water pipes
Positive_Review: We had very little sleep as there was a continious banging noise coming from our bathroom it was every five minutes i asked my wife if she wanted to complain but she said she can sleep through it which i could not when the banging did recede at around 4 am i finally got some sleep of which i slept through my 9 am alarm and was late for a family celebration in southall the noise appeared to be from the water pipes i did report this to the staff of which she gave me a 20 per cent discount on the booking which we did not feel was enough we loved the hotel and felt privelidged to be stopping there but sadly came out with a big negative against the many positives

Negative_Review: Only 1 sachet of coffee in the room despite there being loads of Decaff coffee sachets Only 1 packet of biscuits left too Over 300 for the night has to be borne in mind for this Waited for over 30 minutes to get served at the residents bar did not seem to be enough staff for the rush after a concert
Positive_Review: Comfy bed and quiet clean room

Negative_Review: Did not appear to cope particularly well with large number of guests attending concert at the nearby stadium Long queues to check in in the restaurant and bar Unfortunately on this occasion service was poor value for premium price
Positive_Review: Very comfortable room particularly spacious bed Good location for nearby Wembley Stadium events Staff friendly and tried their best to help despite being under pressure from large number of guests staying at hotel

Negative_Review: Staff allowed people to use the escalator up to the 3rd floor and hi jack the lifts on their way down to the ground floor preventing those waiting on the ground floor from getting to floors 4 and above
Positive_Review: Location and accommodation great

Negative_Review: The only window in our room looked out onto a wall which was very depressing No views at all The one room price was 595 for 3 which was a bit of a rip off The hotel was booked full because of the Billy Joel concert at Wembley and sense they up their prices when big events are next door
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful Bar snacks and breakfasts were excellent Discounted car parking very close by and location is great for Wembley stadium Rooms were clean and beds ok although hard for my liking

Negative_Review: Afternoon tea
Positive_Review: Comfy bed Excellent location for Wembley Loved executive lounge but disappointed at limited choice of beverages Still great though Prosecco would have been a welcome addition Also afternoon tea could have been healthier with sandwiches loved breakfast choice and quality of food Delicious

Negative_Review: Security
Positive_Review: First night we went to N event met up with friends in Sky bar We were told to move to residents bar on level 3 Which we did my partner went to our room for about 10 mins to put phone on charge on return he was not allowed back in bar We were all escorted to our rooms and not allowed out This weather by external security firm Next day Hilton staff so apologetic And fabulous service over evening meal accompanied by complementary champagne

Negative_Review: On the busy day of concert the hotel was in our view not staffed to cope anx therefore everything good about it and staff was undermined a real Shame as it meant the most fundamental levels of service were compromised
Positive_Review: Location helpfulness of staff Good breakfast choice Good facilities

Negative_Review: The hotel was fully booked due to the concert at the stadium so there were queues to access the lifts to get up to your room and no easy access to any stairs as an aternative
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfy and the pillows were amazing best night s sleep in a while

Negative_Review: 350 per night and extra 16 each for breakfast Room looked out at a corrugated metal wall when I asked for a better view I was told we would have to pay more Restaurants couldn t cope with demand Food was poor quality Extra charge for wifi in room
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: There were the tiniest products in the bathroom so stingy for the price we had to pay and so insufficient for two people for two nights There was a serious lack of staff in the bar after an event and their lack of ability to do their job efficiently was obvious for all to see The cleanliness or lack of it in the corridors was poor there was a piece of plastic bag on our floor when we arrived and it was still there on the second day despite us seeing the cleaners on our floor both days The lack of attention to detail in laying the tables for breakfast no salt and pepper One morning my cup of tea looked like a cup of hot milk when the waitress poured it from a large just of tea
Positive_Review: The breakfast was good and the location of the hotel was perfect for Wembley Arena and Stadium

Negative_Review: Balloons on bed and one slice of gateaux for my husbands 60th was appreciated but a bit sad A celebration bottle with two glasses would have been far more approriate
Positive_Review: View of Wembley Stadium was fantastic Breakfast delicious with very attentive staff

Negative_Review: Lenins are not changed We stayed for a total of 5 nights and I had a mushroom sauce spot on the inside of the duvet cover It was never changed and I did not ask for it to be changed because I wanted to see if they really change their lenins every 3 days as they promise I was disappoined unfortunately The floor has almost 100 rooms and the lifts are situated in one place only For our room it was a relatively long walk especially when we came back with shopping bags Make sure to ask for a room close to the lift if this is not convenient for you
Positive_Review: Staff was nice They allowed us an early checkin and late checkout for no extra charge The location is wow You can see Wembly stadium for the restautant on form some rooms London Designer Outlet is literally next to the hotel Rooms are spacious

Negative_Review: The drinks were a little expensive but it s only what you would expect from the chain My sister said that they closed the roof bar for a wedding which was a bit disappointing but i suppose it can t be helped
Positive_Review: It wasn t actually myself that stayed here I booked it for my sister and her husband But she said that she really enjoyed herself

Negative_Review: I thought the bar menu could have been better with more choices
Positive_Review: I liked the location the cleanliness and the friendliness of the staff even though I didn t have breakfast I thought the price was superb had I have taken it one of my colleagues told me the breakfast was superb

Negative_Review: Room not re dy at 3 00 pm so waited for 2hour and had access to exec suite for a few hours from 3 00 pm up to 9 00pm on a Saturday night closed toi early
Positive_Review: Parking too expensive as you had to pay on average 10 for each exit and only 15 00 for 1 day if you did not leave the car park at all A royal rip off abd its not Mayfair

Negative_Review: Would have liked more milk pots in the room There were only four for two people Could have requested more but it was late
Positive_Review: Great size room with a very comfortable super king bed The room was also really quiet we couldn t hear anyone else at all Excellent breakfast and secure parking at Gold car park with reduced rate Brilliant location

Negative_Review: The restaurant was pricey when travelling as a family However there are lots of more affordable restaurants nearby
Positive_Review: The cleanliness and the friendly staff Great location for the arena stadium tube shops and restaurants The hotel breakfast was lovely with a great variety of food

Negative_Review: Room service was bad not what was in menu Had to go without in rhe end Then they left the tray in the room with the food on all day 1 coffee satchel The carpet was not vacuumed Only 1 chair
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The wifi did not work correctly and was slow when it did work
Positive_Review: Felt welcomed soon as we walked through the entrance very clean Was given complimentery bottle of wine to celebrate our 2 year wedding anniversary Will be returning next year Thank you hilton wembley

Negative_Review: It was a little further out from London Euston than we had imagine however it was each to reach on public transport We lots of shops and eateries just two minutes walk away
Positive_Review: The welcome and service was impeccable from all staff Lovely room overlooking wembley thankyou for the free upgrade too Breakfast was gorgeous too something to suit all tastes

Negative_Review: Room was not up to standard There were items left in mini bar fridge from last person which were a week out of date On leaving the reception tried to Bill me for the mini bar clearly this hasn t been restocked Shame as our overall stay was good
Positive_Review: Location to the arena

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent choices at breakfast food lovely and fresh Rooms very spacious clean and that bed was so comfortable I didn t want to leave it Location ideal for Wembley stadium

Negative_Review: We went to the pool at 8 30pm on a Sunday The changing room shower cubicles and pool area were covered in hair If appeared to have not been cleaned for a very long time Considering it was evening time we were shocked to find a group of children playing noisily with frisbees and unsupervised in the pool The water was disgusting with huge clumps of hair floating around so we headed off to the sauna to find that it was even more rank there I ve been to council community pools with a much higher standard of cleanliness My advice would be NOT to visit this hotel if it is for the pool sauna Everything else was great
Positive_Review: The hotel lobby and restaurant bars were wonderful The bedroom was amazing Staff were friendly Perfect location less than a minutes walk from the arena discount shopping centre and restaurants

Negative_Review: Nothing to dislike
Positive_Review: Staff were excellent it was our Anniversary the bed was decorated with two swans made from towels there were red rose petals all over the bed There s was also cake with fresh fruit The bed was comfy the room was large clean the breakfast choice was brilliant The hotels Sky Bar provides fantastic views of the stadium

Negative_Review: we checked in at 11 30pm we were behind two girls who insisted that they had a booking but were told they did not We had to wait 10 mins while one of the girls checked her phone for the booking The receptionist could have asked us to book in while she was doing it In the end I had to ask if we could book in before them
Positive_Review: everything was like brand new

Negative_Review: I stayed on the 7th floor and it was very noisy I got no sleep until 3am because of a wedding reception in the hotel
Positive_Review: Check out time and room facilities

Negative_Review: Bedding was changed which is great but the clean bedding that was put on was stained other than that no problems
Positive_Review: Bedroom very comfortable and excellent location for Wembley stadium

Negative_Review: I didn t like the fact the site says heated pool when it was freezing cold when we went Other than that excellent hotel
Positive_Review: Loved the pool comfortable beds and the breakfast

Negative_Review: After finally checking in we where given a room key on the 5th floor to our amazement we opened the correct door with the key given to find the room already occupied How this can happen in a modern hotel with electronic locks and a computer management system is beyond me no explanation was offered just a look of disbelief I have raised my concern with the customer complaints dept but have not had a relply
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Room lay out lighting Parking situation Facilities both swimming pool gym were very disappointing Certainly not what I would call the Hilton The staff were very good but the rooms are not 4 5 Impressive reception hall very disappointing room Parking too expensive We won t be returning
Positive_Review: The staff were very nice helpful friendly The breakfast was very good Good variety of food and good quality Something for everyone

Negative_Review: N a
Positive_Review: Excellent location for a visit to London Set immediately next door to Wembley Stadium The hotel is attached to a very good shopping area with lots of places to eat nearby and also a really good park if you have young children Wembley Park tube station only 5mins walk and then it s just a 20min tube journey to the city The hotel itself is very impressive with excellent facilities Gym swimming pool etc Breakfast was excellent with a choice of full English and continental The staff at the hotel were fantastic had a couple of minor issues that I raised with them but they were sorted without fuss and promptly Excellent place that we will gladly return to

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: They did not had room we have booked for Your website conform room for 4 people witch was not available at time of checkin I end up spending extra 900 00

Negative_Review: Wifi didn t work drilling at 8am in the morning I booked a high tier room with view of Wembley got a view of a brick wall
Positive_Review: Location is ideal bed comfy

Negative_Review: Staff wasn t the most friendly I felt I was really ripped off with the amount I payed
Positive_Review: Room was not worth the money at all was tiny Very disappointed won t be re turning

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The King Sized Bedroom is spacious Rooms are very nice The location is great especially at night looking at the wembley stadium across the road The staff were very polite and helpful Would definitely stay here again

Negative_Review: A rather large amount of children staying at the property and using the fitness centre swimming pool A separate pool for children to do as they please would be far superior
Positive_Review: Possibly the best Hilton hotel resort to stay in Friendliness and efficiency of all staff services and facilities bars and restaurants within the property and all round value for money

Negative_Review: Poor wifi reception and speed in rooms Didn t remember tablet wifi connection so kept dropping connections
Positive_Review: Location excellent Room size was great

Negative_Review: Wifi was not that great
Positive_Review: The room were very comfortable and the staff were very helpful and polite Me and my partner come here for 30th birthday and you made it very lovely for us Thankyou

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Modern nice clean sophisticated luxury hotel Very large room modern decor and facilities with a Hugh comfortable bed attractive bathroom with luxury shampoo etc lovely bar area with a fab view of Wembley Stadium Gorgeous Restaurant

Negative_Review: Wi fi connectivity issue and also house keeping people disturbing and entering the room without being asked for house keeping service
Positive_Review: People at reception

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Everything was excellent Friendly service just right for the underground excellent curry house at the back Wembley tandoori and all the shopping outlets on the doorstep

Negative_Review: The room service at night was terrible staff couldn t even provide a glass of water with ice She told me to go and find the ice dispenser near the lifts
Positive_Review: The reception staff and breakfast staff were really helpful And it was in great location of the se arena

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Extremely happy with this hotel Breakfast was 5 Bed was huge and comfortable Very clean spacious quite rooms Spa facilities perfectly looked after Location spot on shops and restaurants just around the corner But biggest thanks to the amazing staff who made sure we are well looked after Especially concierge Alex and receptionist Dorina went an extra mile to ensure my partners birthday was unforgettable Many thanks

Negative_Review: very costly parking in a multi storey if you are nipping in and out of the car park if you are parking up and not moving again then you will pay 15 do not like the way they seperate breakfast from the room charge
Positive_Review: Nice hotel as you would expect for a Hilton and right next door to the arena

Negative_Review: The bath shower wasn t very big for the room but other than that everything was brilliant
Positive_Review: Staff were so warm and welcoming and made our first visit to this hotel so straight forward only stayed one night but didn t want to leave it was so nice

Negative_Review: The showers were cold on the morning we left due to a boiler fault But to be fair to the staff the gave us our dinner the evening before complimentary to say sorry These things happen and it s how there dealt with that matters
Positive_Review: We came to do a Wembley tour and sightseeing in London The tube was a 5 minute walk away and the stadium we could see from our room The hotel had parking friendly staff and a fabulous breakfast at a very reasonable price Recommend a stay

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room was beautiful super comfy large bed and the facilities were great thoroughly enjoyed the free use of pool and sauna Excellent location also Will be staying again

Negative_Review: The swimming pool was not very clean the tiles were scummy and the water very cloudy Not facility to change money for the lockers Was pressured by cleaning staff at 11am on check out morning so they could clean the room check out is at 12pm
Positive_Review: Overall a clean well presented hotel Staff friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: The receptionists asked if I wanted to pay to access the drinks in the room only to find the fridge was actually empty when we arrived
Positive_Review: The breakfast was delicious and there was plenty to choose from

Negative_Review: It was a little difficult to find the hotel as there was no signage on the high road and the distance from the lift to the room was long
Positive_Review: The staff was very friendly and extremely helpful and the location was perfect

Negative_Review: Would have like to have gone to the roof top bar but couldn t because of an avent
Positive_Review: The modern rooms and the stunning lobby and bar and the fact we were able to check in earlier than the check in time

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff were super helpful loved the open seated area of the bar and the food was great Air con in the room was quiet and kept the room at the perfect temp slept really well Didn t need to go anywhere else

Negative_Review: For 125 a night I would have thought breakfast would be included The hotel has very poor telephone signal so you would expect excellent wifi nope that was awful too On checking in the manager put 100 worth of extras on my bill 100 with out asking
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Breakfast has good variety but the scrambled eggs were very soggy not nice And pastries were a bit dry
Positive_Review: Great location for shopping at the London Designer Outlet Spaceous comfy room Friendly and fun staff onsite gym

Negative_Review: Shower was a a bit under powered Tea coffee tray in room only had enough coffee for a cup each but loads of tea I don t like tea
Positive_Review: Bed was super comfy view from room was lovely Not a peep to be heard from outside or inside nice undisturbed sleep Aircon is great There s a phone in the toilet for those TP emergencies I m guessing The Breakfast options were brilliant everything from pancakes full English to continental Plus some naughty nutella muffins delicious You re directly across from both Wembley Stadium and the hydro so convenient for events

Negative_Review: Nothing to say Was perfect
Positive_Review: Hotel was spotless the staff were very helpful and friendly and they responded to my requests at point of booking Made it a fantastic stay and many thanks for the rose petals and the cake Well done Hilton and well Done to your customer service We had a fantastic time and will definately return in the near future

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent room spacious clean comfortable Staff were very pleasant and helpful leisure facilities were very good Breakfast was plentiful and good quality with excellent service Handy for the Underground at Wembley park and plenty of eating venues close by A short tube trip to the city centre

Negative_Review: Too few staff on duty at the bar when we got back from the show at 10pm
Positive_Review: We stayed at this hotel as we were going to a show at SSE Arena and couldn t fault the location

Negative_Review: Can t think of anything
Positive_Review: Location was great for the SSE Arena Nearby restaurants were great and shopping on doorstep too Staff were fantastic and the room was one of the best we ve stayed in for years Thanks very much we ll be back again

Negative_Review: One of the bar staff went to the bar told it was table service A minute later a bunch of people were served at the bar took 10 minutes to get a drink Left after we finished our drink WiFi was rubbish
Positive_Review: Nice and clean good facilities friendly staff great location next to the arena Really good self serve breakfast

Negative_Review: Weak WiFi reception in our room but reachable
Positive_Review: Everything Staff were friendly and helpful Facilities were clean and organized Location was great in a quiet neighbourhood Overall was great

Negative_Review: Stayed 2 nights both of which were interrupted by members of staff trying to get into our room when we were inside it sleeping We couldn t fathom why this kept happening to us and the receptionist seemed to be shocked however did nothing to sort the problem As a 7 month pregnant woman I was so afraid that me and my boyfriend were being stalked or targeted by someone creepy
Positive_Review: Nice bathroom and room with a big comfy bed Enjoyed the size of the room too

Negative_Review: The furnishings were not what I expected from a Hilton property The hallways to the room looked industrial with almost no pictures to brighten things up
Positive_Review: The front desk staff and the bar staff were very friendly and helpful The one feature we did think was notable in our room was the small square area of the bathroom mirror that never fogged up after a shower

Negative_Review: After checking in we experienced a power cut the lifts did not work and we couldn t get to our room for a while After a long journey all we wanted to do was order some room service but due to the power cut this was not possible The kitchen opening times were not extended
Positive_Review: Location was good beds were comfortable and clean Bathroom was a good size Lots of wardrobe space

Negative_Review: There was a number of weddings taking place when we stayed so we did not get a good sleep There was music playing and other guests were noisey
Positive_Review: Polite staff and clean rooms

Negative_Review: No view at all not even a sky one just metal of building very close to windows wish this had been stated as I would not have booked as open views are very important to us Cleanliness on first day was poor only one toilet roll and half used bottles of toiletries left and hardly any tea coffee or sugar so had to ask reception second day every thing very clean and fully supplied a bit random Mattress hard and uncomfortable Seat dirty first night Room getting a bit shabby Disabled Access 617
Positive_Review: Reception staff helpful Nice bathroom with white towels great shower and TV speakers for sound Pool and Gym V Good Quiet and air con good Relaxed atmosphere Situated in a great area good for shopping eating out and small supermarkets and Wembly Stadium steps away

Negative_Review: The timings of the restaurant and bar were different all over and the bouncer to the sky bar was extremely rude
Positive_Review: The stay was fabulous Breakfast was excellent there were a lot of things to choose from and everything was fresh and tasty I had a better nights sleep here than at home the pillows are just wonderful I d stay here every time I come to London

Negative_Review: Miss information regarding opening times of the bar area a group of us went there to enjoy a last drink of the evening at 1240am to be told bar closed at 1230am this then meant we went out of hotel spending 60 pounds on cabs to find nothing only to be told when we woke to the hotel again they said we could have had the drinks for 2 reasons 1 we could have bought on our room tab and drunk them outside of the bar and secondly when I checked the hotel information the bar is supposed to be open till 1am Spoilt the evening for us all
Positive_Review: Great location and really enjoyed the stay the hotel was very well set up and professional

Negative_Review: Due to a football team staying we were moved out of the bar whilst enjoying a drink areas we were resting in several times This was not bought to our attention would happen when booking Also an old tray of dirty cutlery food was left by the previous room occupant and remained there all day evening we had to ask for it to be removed
Positive_Review: Location was great

Negative_Review: We booked a week before and ot was amazing Room was fantastic facilities were great We both enjoyed ourselves no end Would definitely book again
Positive_Review: We booked a week before and had an amazing time Room was fant

Negative_Review: the food was disappointing 45 for a very ordinary buffet dinner that could be had in many pubs for a third of the price or less and with waitress service
Positive_Review: Gorgeous bath towels lovely thick and soft and the duvet was sumptuous

Negative_Review: The cleanliness was very disappointing there was stains on the pillows and duvet there was food in the corridors which was left there for hours this with the cleaners operating on this floor so they must of walked past this there was half eaten food in the fridge and the shower dripped for the price I paid I was very disappointed at the end of the day I booked a room at the Hilton the name should say it all but on my visit it did not I felt like booking somewhere else
Positive_Review: the location was good as we had tickets For Wembley food was good as booked breakfast

Negative_Review: 20 minute plus queue to check in Grrrr 4 for a bottle of water in the room is a bit much given most hotels I stay in even on busines its complimentary
Positive_Review: Location to the stadium
