Negative_Review: We were told over the phone that the pool closed at 18 00 so we didn t take out swimming things When we got there the sign said it didn t close until 22 00 Also after having a bath in the room the plug wouldn t work so we couldn t empty the bath water
Positive_Review: The view was better than expected The bed was huge and very comfortable The way the staff handled the crowds when the football team were leaving the hotel

Negative_Review: Room not ready till 4 45pm which really spoilt our plans to soak up the wembley atmosphere before the 5 15pm kick off We were told by reception we could use the executive lounge facilities which we had planned to after our 7 hour drive I booked and paid for an executive suite for that very reason so that we could have food and drink after our long journey But on trying to access the lounge we were told it was out of bounds till later but we could go to the Sky bar instead So we did but our supposed complimentary food and drink turned into a 40 bill for 2 beers 2 vodka and lemonades and 1 fish and chips I understand that there was a match on and players were still at the hotel but I would imagine a large amount of people book this hotel to watch various sporting events so it s not fair that I paid a lot of money for facilities I wasn t allowed to have On checkout I complained but the receptionist just shrugged and said at least your team won Had she validated my car park ticket for free I would have been quite pleased but no I still had to pay the car parking fee I accept things don t always work out but it s how businesses compensate their customers that sets them apart The Hilton offered nothing Not even an apology There s a lot of hotels close enough to the stadium so in future I will choose one of those
Positive_Review: Location is superb for Wembley events

Negative_Review: The Guiness was lovely but the price was steep Must be the London prices Still had an enjoyable evening in the bar
Positive_Review: For my son and I Having the Hotel close to the Stadium was brilliant Especially after watching the community Shield After a long day it was nice to have a shower and relax in the Hotel bar

Negative_Review: Confusion as the Executive lounge was closed during the day and we were issued with a card for the Icons lounge but they would not accept it
Positive_Review: Location and facilities Executive lounge very good and staff helpful

Negative_Review: We had to pay extra for breakfast however it was only 10 the range available was super fresh
Positive_Review: Security was tight Only allowing residents into the hotel It was a match day they kept excellent control Staff were helpful We had forgotten our toothbrushes tgey were able to provide us with some All in all very accommodating comfortable stay

Negative_Review: Check in was a joke should have had an executive room but told wouldn t be available until after 5 15 considering we had to be in Wembley stadium before that obviously this was unacceptable so we had to settle for a normal room no mini bar They kindly still allowed us entrance to executive lounge fab it was empty no canap s only soft drinks we had a ball NOT
Positive_Review: Location is excellent

Negative_Review: Having to pay for wifi Showers water wasn t hot enough neither much power The parking lots of roads closed around the hotel therefore hard to navigate to the car park Parking normally is 35 a night day light robbery get your ticket validated by reception will drop it down to 15
Positive_Review: Excellent location Warm welcome from a hunky receptionist called Daniel Clean large rooms

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The rooms were large bright and the beds were super comfortable There was a great atmosphere on Saturday due to the Liverpool team being guests in the hotel and our kids loved the excitement It s a great hotel if you re going to any event in Wembley stadium

Negative_Review: Reason for the visit was to go to an event the hotel would not hold our bags for us the next day as a typical hotel does Our event didn t have the facilities to hold our bags we wasn t allowed to take our bags in So we travelled 3 hours and spent a night in London spent all this money for nothing All because the hotel wouldn t hold our bags
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The only thing I would have to say that really disappointed me was the bed During mine my friend s stay on 5th June 2015 the bed was like a dream one of those mattresses you lay down on just sink into However during this time around s stay the mattress was less than satisfactory extremely disappointing I sat down on the bed upon entering the room immediately noticed the difference as did my friend We both ended up not being able to sleep properly during our stay on 10th July 2016 due to not being able to get comfortable as the mattress was too hard to be able to get comfortable on we both ended up with our shoulders back hurting when we checked out the next day Please please change back to the mattress supplier you were using during 2015
Positive_Review: I absolutely loved the size of the room I love the fact also that there was a gym swimming pool to use at my leisure Good location within walking distance to the SSE Arena Wembley good connections to the tube

Negative_Review: I think the pool area could be slightly updated or have nice pool lighting to match up to the standard of the rest of the hotel
Positive_Review: The bed was so comfortable The hotel is modern and clean very nice all round and in a great location

Negative_Review: Absolutely nothing
Positive_Review: Could not have faulted our stay A friend and I travelled from Burton on Trent to watch a theatre show in London Searching for a hotel was hard due to the expense and they didn t look worth the money That was until we saw the Hilton and decided it was perfect We had to pay the extra to travel but it wasn t a problem Our stay was amazing and we ll worth the money My friend and I are single parents who work long hours so this was a major treat Thankyou so much to your staff

Negative_Review: The staff are very rude and not very well spoken Over the 2 nights we had a member of housekeeping walts into our room about 3 times without even knocking This is out of order I will not be coming back there again
Positive_Review: The bathroom Wasn t much more too like with such Un helpful staff

Negative_Review: Being told by the barman that I was being awkward for sending back a beer that was absolutely rancid He didn t want to take it off the bill and continued to tell me that the beer was fine Luckily a fellow customer tasted the beer and agreed with my point This barman is a liability to your hotel I complained to the duty manager but he seemed indifferent Their loss Will never stay here again
Positive_Review: Great meal in the restaurant In contrast to the bar the staff couldn t be nicer and the food was great

Negative_Review: Breakfast options were lacking Room service was poor nothimg was actually cleaned Absolutely dirty swimming and changing areas with no staff or lifeguard present Kids were diving and in the jacuzzi etc No notice of wedding events so we couldn t even use the sky bar the whole time we were there
Positive_Review: Welcome at check in was good but is expected from Hilton

Negative_Review: Should be able to smoke on the bar balcony ended up going to a different pub due to not being able to smoke would have loved to have stayed there but we are smokers
Positive_Review: Hotel was lovely staff very helpful

Negative_Review: The wifi could should have been free in the room this is quite standard in hotels these days
Positive_Review: The location was very convenient Room was quiet and bed was very comfortable

Negative_Review: The Front desk staff response to simple enquiries She cut me off before I could get a word in
Positive_Review: The breakfast It had a lot of variety to choose from

Negative_Review: The sink was blocked really slow to drain despite its pretty bowl presentation I did mention this at check out and I m hoping it will be sorted for the next guest s
Positive_Review: Beautiful room presentation with coffee and tea supplies Posh presentation very clean Bathroom mirror had a clear mirror despite steam in bathroom so I didn t need to wipe over for a clear view It was my boyfriend s birthday and the Hilton manager wrote us a Hilton birthday card How cool is that Thank you

Negative_Review: The bed was a little hard There was no free water in the room 1 bottle was 3 95 very expensive

Negative_Review: You have to pay 50 to use the minibar to cool your things These 50 are refundable but still it is annoying specialy when the minibar is already empty so i didnt get the point of this Also when we reached the hotel no one helped us in moving our bags to the room
Positive_Review: Big room nice room

Negative_Review: Breakfast included for that price
Positive_Review: The biggest and most comfortable bed I ve ever stayed in The bathroom was also amazing and the location was perfect as we went for the Beyonce concert

Negative_Review: I was given a room with disabled access and facilites it felt a little cramped and the bathroom was obviously not as pictured as there was no disabled bathroom in the photos
Positive_Review: Breakfast and hotel location and facilities were excellent If you walk the right direction which I didn t on the first day it is walking distance from the station on a pedestrian walkway

Negative_Review: The room was so hot and air conditioning didn t appear to be working Also noise buzzing in bathroom disturbing
Positive_Review: Couldn t fault breakfast and comfy beds Very clean too

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Our overnight stay was excellent The staff were exceptional from reception to the excecutive lounge Breakfast was a lovely surprise as the variety and amount on offer was amazing we also had afternoon tea and drinks throughout our stay My first thoughts on booking was that I may have paid a little to much for our overnight stay but when you added up the lovely breakfast afternoon tea and beverages throughout our stay we were quids in My only disappoint we did not have time to stay longer but we will be back

Negative_Review: Breakfast was average and some of the teapots plates and cutlery were dirty which was a bit shocking The juices were not fresh and not a lot of variety when it came to the food Staff were not that pleasant The bathroom in the room was below average and not very clean Housekeeping didn t do a good job at all The corridors had a musty smell
Positive_Review: The location was awesome The hotel seemed nice modern

Negative_Review: Could not get a cribb for my one year old even though I requested one in well advance Last min I am told that they dont have anythjng left Inam surprised to hear that from Hilton

Negative_Review: No Negative

Positive_Review: The reception staff were extremely efficient and very friendly A professional service with a smile We were delighted with our stay Thank u all

Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable was given free late check out and the staff were really friendly too

Negative_Review: Disappointed that we had to pay for parking It was was nice that we had a discounted rate however I have never had to pay for parking in a hotel garage

Negative_Review: My partner left her earings on the side board next to the bed We rang that afternoon and housekeeping found them We were told there was no need to return to pick them up as they would put them in the post They did not turn up This was very disappointing and not the service you would expect from a high star rating hotel Lesson Do not trust housekeeping
Positive_Review: The location next to Wembley for a concert was excellent We went to watch Coldplay and it was great to just walk a few yards to the hotel after the gig The stay was soured however by after service

Negative_Review: Staff not very friendly had to wait 20mins to get new key for room when mine stopped working breakfast complete rip off after paying in advance was then charged 17 to have it room service then it was cold and toast not toasted do not bother to have breakfast

Negative_Review: I did not encounter any problems during my stay here
Positive_Review: It was just a one night s stay and this hotel served the purpose well Clean and spacious room with comfortable bed The staff was very pleasant and helpful If I were to visit Wembley again would definitely stay here Breakfast spread was also very good Good value for money for the price you pay versus the provisions available

Negative_Review: The check out staff was extremely rude and unhelpful When I raised my issues she did not even acknowledge my complaint nor did she apologies or even offer a complaint form She instead tried to ignore me and was extremely dismissive and rude The room was very dirty with a minibar empty of any hotel items but filled with some previous guest private food items that been growing mold for some time dirty toilet seat and rubbish in the bathroom stained bedding I will think twice to book with Hilton again in the future due to this
Positive_Review: The check in staff was very polite

Negative_Review: Would have preferred free wi fi access in all parts of the hotel rather than just the reception area in particular it would be helpful to have free wi fi in the rooms

Negative_Review: On booking I stated time of arrival would be 10 30am On arrival told room was not ready Would of been nice if bar was open later as Room service absolutely extorshonate so good to have restaurants near by Breakfast was awful Fairly cold food Sausages tasted rubbery and cheap Hash browns not cooked For 12 50 each it was a rip off
Positive_Review: Great space ideal location for purpose of trip great amenities near by Very clean

Negative_Review: You ll have to drive half an hour to get n the city but it s directly so very convevient

Negative_Review: was not that clean bath was dirty so were the sheets i ended p getting my sleeping bag out of my car to sleep on constantly called reception for room service and they did not pick up at all

Negative_Review: Bar was a bit pricey 22 for a wine and a spirit

Negative_Review: I would suggest to have the WIFI included but that s the only thing I would change

Negative_Review: Don t expect to be able to get into the Sky Bar it fills quickly

Negative_Review: No valet for parking No catering for gluten free when we asked at breakfast we were told we have fruit to offer Cold breakfast in room Poor value for money

Positive_Review: The staff were all extremely helpful and cheerful particularly Liliana and Macerena on the front desk Neil Lopez on the breakfast bar provided fabulous customer service seating me in the sun in the front window which was great for my jetlag and I could watch all the pedestrians

Positive_Review: Everything is gorgeous and amazing Wonderful and helpful staff they are ready to assist with great smile never say NO but always say YES to assist and aware that your stay at the hotel will be so happy and unforgettable event I recommend people to try and they will discover the difference Thanks a lot Hilton London Wembley Keep going forward Good luck DR ISSA

Negative_Review: Not much to fault in truth Much prefer a walk in shower than the dated low pressured over bath type
Positive_Review: Excellent location overlooking the iconic Wembley stadium Large and comfy bed and a great variety of quality breakfast Use of the heated pool Sauna and Steam room a bonus Plus reduced rate parking for hotel guests

Negative_Review: Loved everything
Positive_Review: The helpfulness and friendliness of the staff The location The clean rooms The high standard of the hotel and linen The atmosphere The size of the rooms The amenities near the hotel Shopping center Restaurants Metro is located close by Supermarket is also close

Negative_Review: We attended a concert which ended about 2145 hrs The restaurant was closed when we got back to the hotel though the Hilton website says they do after concert buffets
Positive_Review: We ve been before like rooms meals

Negative_Review: We had a fault in our room with the sink it wouldn t drain was promised someone would come to fix the next day an hour before we checked out someone came not much use by that point
Positive_Review: Breakfast was lovely

Negative_Review: I wish the cleaner would have emptied our bin when she came in the morning and given us of extra cream
Positive_Review: The room itself was beautifully designed and the bed was vey comfortable Also the front desk was very polite and helpful

Negative_Review: Location never been to Wembley before and it was Wembley I was disappointed with Internet was not good at all
Positive_Review: Staff were very polite beds comfy and rooms very clean Good in restaurant was good

Negative_Review: Limited choice of tea and coffee in the room throughout the stay
Positive_Review: Great location close to shops restaurants and stadium very pleasant room clean modern bathrooms internet and safe box in room staff were very nice access to swimming pool access to roof top bar plenty of car parking

Negative_Review: The sky bar was only open to private parties this was disappointing as it was the reason I booked this hotel
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfy very nice toiletries in bathroom easy to use tv shower and air con Breakfast great choice of hot and cold options all staff on every level polite and welcoming

Negative_Review: Being woken up on our first night and it was long day the phone went in the middle of the night and by time we thought about anwsering it it stopped most annoying it scared the life out of us
Positive_Review: Position and not far from the tube

Negative_Review: I would not recommend leaving you re bags with the hotel if u arrive early or after check out I left mine when i arrived early and when i checked in and asked for my bag they took me to the storage and let me find my own bag and did not check any details so i could have taken the LV bags and other designers as well as mine Also they need to clean the front desks theres alot of dust on there lamps And stains in the rooms
Positive_Review: The location

Negative_Review: The food and drinks could have been cheaper in the hotel but it is London
Positive_Review: Really friendly staff very clean room and bathroom And super huge and comfy bed

Negative_Review: Some of the wallpaper in the rooms was flaky and some of the paint had been scratched off the walls Paid wifi was expensive and therefore didn t use it although being from the UK this wasn t a problem
Positive_Review: The bedrooms were a good size Bathroom decoration was nice looked clean and sleek

Negative_Review: For the price that was paid I would have expected a complimentary bottle of water
Positive_Review: My parents are aged and have limited experience of staying in hotels What I liked about the hotel was that they were able to find their way around and communicate with the staff easily Breakfast quality and variety was to the standard that I expected Rooms were very comfortable easy to work your way around use the bathroom facilities TV Radio etc

Negative_Review: View Our hotel room overlooked the air conditioning unit it was a lovely sunny day so would have been nice to have a better view from the room
Positive_Review: The staff were brilliant polite and very helpful There was a great atmosphere in the hotel and nothing was ever too much for them to do

Negative_Review: You were unable to put anything in the fridge as you had to pay 5 I think for this to be open for the mini bar We simply wanted to put our drink in there to keep cool The room was basic for the price we paid Also to charge 3 95 for a bottle of water was very overpriced
Positive_Review: The bed was lovely and comfy along with the pillows The location was fantastic

Negative_Review: More information on events being held in the Sky Bar for example to be given and other things happening in hotel A map would help too
Positive_Review: Comfortable clean room Easy parking with decent discount Literally on the doorstep of Wembley stadium And decent mirrors to get ready in Checked in 3 hours earlier than usual time

Negative_Review: Very disappointed that swimming pool didn t open before 8 on Saturday Carpets were dirty and ended up with cherry tomatoe on sole of my shoe from walking through corridor Dirty trays of food left on floor in hallway Counter tops in bedroom and bathroom were all marked n chipped So made it look tacky I had expected a lot more for 323 a night Seems anyone can enter and go to the sky bar wasn t asked for room number or proof Over all very disappointed and wouldn t stay at the Hilton again Save your money there s a budge lodge down the road n ul get exactly same for a lot cheaper
Positive_Review: Breakfast was good

Negative_Review: A lot of people after the concert in lifts going to top sky bar however it soon calmed down and no noise from the bar after
Positive_Review: Great location for concert at Wembley clean rooms executive longe was really nice to relax in Meal before concert was lovely and service fantastic Really enjoyed the baileys coffee in residents bar after concert Great stay and will book again and recommend to family and friends

Negative_Review: footie team not getting into the premiership
Positive_Review: breakfast very good went for football match perfect location plenty of eating places and shops within walking distance loved the roof top bar brill for watching all the football fans arriving

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Wow Excellent for an event at Wembley Parking was only 15 through the hotel but for non residents it was 85 given it was an event Take that from the hotel charge and the price is even more reasonable Amazing buffet breakfast

Negative_Review: There is nothing we could fault
Positive_Review: The location is perfect for Wembley Stadium right next door Rooms were very clean and spacious and staff were very pleasant

Negative_Review: The bed was hard so was the pillows the air con was very noisie there was a big brown stain on the carpet as soon as you walked into the room which did not impress me as they say first impressions do count It was meant to be a Deluxe room

Negative_Review: Watch out at the bar as they automatically add a service charge on without asking One of those hotels where you just can t get cool enough
Positive_Review: Hotel was lovely great location if you are going to Wembley price hiked up because we were going to a concert more than double so value for money not great

Negative_Review: Maybe a little more support for the minimal bar staff after the concert but that is just a minor issue in my opinion
Positive_Review: Wonderful experience We stayed at a busy time as there was a Coldplay concert on but everything was still taken care of really well

Negative_Review: Breakfast was very disappointing Hot food was all gone and had to wait half an hour for more Totally unacceptable from a hotel of this calibre
Positive_Review: We enjoyed the executive lounge and the swimming pool

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very comfy bed the staff were very friendly upon arrival and throughout our stay and we had a great view from our room The area around the hotel was also very nice with plenty of restaurants and shops to choose from Would definitely recommend and visit again

Negative_Review: Breakfast was lovely however we had to wait a very long time for our coffee and no milk or teaspoons were given The wait for the lifts was extremely long
Positive_Review: Beds very comfy and spacious bedroom Staff friendly very clean

Negative_Review: We weren t told we had to have our parking ticket valeted by the hotel so nearly ended up paying 75 for parking instead of the 15 advertised but when I found out the hotel validate your ticket there was no issue

Negative_Review: Breakfast room service was stone cold plus the portion size was tiny for 16 50 There was no Gluten free choices of food from the menus in either restaurant or bar
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: I would have expected a better stocked hospitality tray and also complimentary water Picky I may be but would have least expected biscuits on the tray and and more teabags etc Also think having to pay 3 95 for the bottle of water is extortionate even at London prices Also as we were only staying one night I would have expected that housekeeping would have known this and would not have expected them knocking on the door before 9 am to clean it seeing we had room until 12 noon check out Organisation at breakfast could be a little better having to constantly ask for tea coffee clean cutlery etc shouldn t have to happen
Positive_Review: Location was excellent for attending Wembley Stadium Beds were comfortable and room generally clean and tidy Check in and out was very quick and staff very helpful Great to have car park on the door step and a big plus was the cheaper parking rates at 15 better than the 85 if you don t get the ticket validated

Negative_Review: The queue for breakfast was ridiculous we tried once at 9am and again half hour later and then gave up
Positive_Review: The location is perfect for a Wembley event the hotel is of a very high standard

Negative_Review: Restaurant not open saturday lunchtime bar menu limited bar staff 50 excellent 50 not happy bunnies Room service confusing charges for a meal which was cold when it arrived breakfast a total muddle the next morning First room smelt of vomit and quickly moved Confusing information re car parking and charges thankfully at checking out the receptionist told us to get our ticket stamped much clearer info needed
Positive_Review: Location attended conference at Wembley Arena with disabled person so perfect for us Quick response to initial problem with room reception staff brilliant room excellent immaculately clean Car park excellent

Negative_Review: I have stayed at the same hotel before and feel the sink is too shallow and the water does not drain quickly
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable Enjoyed the shower as I was able to control water temperature easily

Negative_Review: The cost of food and drink was extremly high I paid 75 for 3 drinks and 2 rounds of sandwiches
Positive_Review: Location good for Wembley Stadium just a short walk

Negative_Review: Even though we were a couple there was only one pair complimentary slippers and one dressing gown in the room
Positive_Review: The room was very clean and comfortable Breakfast was very nice and there is so much to choose from

Negative_Review: expensive for a night at capacity struggled to cope with numbers staying as bar overrun with people and queues of people just to get into lift to the bars room service very slow as a result too Expensive for a night even had to pay for water Only one tea bag a couple One pack of biscuits a couple Stingy comes to mind
Positive_Review: Right next to Wembley stadium Staff attentive Good breakfast

Negative_Review: Only thing to spoil my stay was the alarm going off at night and having to vacate the building but this can t be helped
Positive_Review: Staff friendly and helpful Excellent facilities and room Wonderful breakfast Couldn t ask for more Would certainly visit again

Negative_Review: For amount of money we paid for a executive room It certainly wasn t value for money Was looking forward to going to the sky bar after a gig at Wembley But couldn t get in because they let so many non residents in The queue was out the main reception and you could only go up in one lift We also had to queue to get in the other bar they wouldn t let us charge our drinks to the room Although location was excellent I would not stay there again
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: People outside the bar area in the hotel queuing and shouting at door staff creating a bad atmosphere and causing us to not bother going for drinks after attending concert
Positive_Review: Location was great for Wembley concert

Negative_Review: Just the price when there s something on at the Stadium but then you expect prices to be higher

Negative_Review: Service was poor for breakfast and also at the bar in the evening considering the cost of the room
Positive_Review: Proximity to Wembley Stadium Comfortable bed and pleasant room

Negative_Review: Couldn t get wifi to connect but we disn t need to Would of been nice to be able to check emails though
Positive_Review: Fabulous room with a view of the stadium so we left at just the right time to miss all the queues

Negative_Review: Breakfast should be included in the price of the rooms

Negative_Review: Nothing could have made my stay any better thank you for making our stay so enjoyable and stress free
Positive_Review: The reception staff were very relaxed cheerful highly efficient and made my daughter and myself feel happy and at home immediately it really makes a difference Everything was great about the hotel but it is the staff in particular that make this hotel stand out

Positive_Review: Comfy beds right next to Wembley and nice roof top bar

Negative_Review: The terrible lady working at the gym was truly awful Ignorant rude unhelpful bad attitude The breakfast was very disappointing in the vip lounge on the 8th floor staff were very slow and not very helpful almost had to beg for a fried eggs they only gave me one that was over cooked as they didn t realise I asked for 2 soft yoke sencond one arrived after I finished And no I didn t find it funny
Positive_Review: Hotel room and lovely check in receptionist

Negative_Review: Room service was a little expensive however you get what you pay for
Positive_Review: Staff where very polite We where able to check in early at no extra cost The hotel food was excellent Definitely go back

Positive_Review: location food was good room was lovely

Negative_Review: I thought the fried breakfast could have been better tasted as though it had been sitting in containers for a while
Positive_Review: Spacious room and bathroom in an ideal location

Negative_Review: Having to leave

Positive_Review: The Executive Lounge is a real bonus The staff were most helpful and professional The Icons bar has a great atmosphere Oscar Iglesias on Reception was most helpful with a smile at a very busy time

Positive_Review: A very warm welcome and easy check in allowed us to use the computer to quickly print out tickets the little things great night sleep

Negative_Review: couldn t think of anything could always be less expensive
Positive_Review: the staff were very pleasant and curious hotel was very clean and security staff pleasant and made our stay feel very safe food was very good

Negative_Review: Nothing

Negative_Review: The breakfast service was slow tea coffee waiter waitress had to be asked several times for a hot drink

Negative_Review: A little pricey but worth it
Positive_Review: Such a brilliant location for Wembley unbelievable rooftop bar overlooking the stadium I would book this hotel every time I visited the stadium

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Perfect location in the heart of Wembley Very friendly and helpful staff Breakfast was amazing Facilities were perfect Would highly recommend this hotel

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: amazing staff fantastic room great view wonderful food brilliant atmosphere fabulous location Staying at the Hilton just made our visit perfect

Negative_Review: Lounge closed at 9 we would have ones it a bit later

Negative_Review: nothing it was superb really enjoyed the breakfast very clean and a great range something for everyone and a chef for fresh omelette

Positive_Review: So close to Wembley and such a pleasure to relax in the rooms in a bit of luxury Great that they could validate your parking when you leave to give you a reduced rate

Positive_Review: The bed was amazing So was the breakfast a bit expensive though

Positive_Review: The room was quiet and clean

Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful Well located for the tube into central London local shops restaurants and Wembley stadium

Negative_Review: Arsenal were not playing that weekend at Wembley
Positive_Review: Nice room with stadium view loved the big bed Fantastic breakfast I could have stayed there eating all day long

Negative_Review: The room seemed smaller than the one we first had Other clients were somewhat noise late hours of the night not continuous just a short burst was disappointed that there was only one sachet of biscuita to share between 2

Negative_Review: Parking could have been a little better however 15 for an overnight stay is still very reasonable
Positive_Review: Amazing Brilliant location beautiful rooms and amazing staff Definitely went the extra mile to ensure our stay was satisfactory Really got a good deal on booking com Fully enjoyed our weekend away And incredibly enjoyed the view We can t wait to come back

Negative_Review: I had a huge issue at breakfast when they failed to provide me with correct information about their Gluten Free products they left me sat waiting for an hour before offering me food containing Gluten which would have made me ill They had no idea what products were Gluten Free and not very dangerous I ended up walking out
Positive_Review: The receptionist went all out for my daughter s birthday They really made her day

Positive_Review: Comfy bed Lovely breakfast Right next to Wembley Arena which was perfect

Negative_Review: The room didn t warm up very well I had it on full heat the fans turned up and couldn t feel a difference at all The plugs provided under the mirror weren t working for some reason
Positive_Review: There was very little noise disruption It was a comfortable welcoming room The staff were so helpful and really friendly

Negative_Review: At the end of the rugby match all sorts of people pilled into the bars within the hotel and made this very very difficult just to get back into the hotel front door All the bouncers for the sky bar and sports bar said sorry full capacity cannot let anyone else in even tho the majority of the people in both the bars where not guests Was not happy about this at all you would think paying guests would get first refusal to the bars where they are staying not every Tom Richard and Harry
Positive_Review: Really great location for the rugby match most people where very accommodating Everything you need for a short break

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely friendly and helpful The concierge upgraded us to have a free breakfast as it was our first stay at the hotel The location is perfect if you re visiting the arena or stadium The hotel has been designed beautifully and there s a shopping mall with lots of restaurants and cafe s on site We had an amazing stay and were really surprised at how the area has been developed When attending the arena or stadium in future we ll definitely stay here

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: I liked that I received an email asking if there was anything they could help me with Also they gave us a free upgrade and gave my girlfriend birthday cake

Negative_Review: had to q on arrival Had to q for breakfast Had to q for ages to get from reception to room due to q at lifts all the time No gluten free bread even though requested prior to arrival Very flimsy tap in bathroom flooded sink area every time was used Had to request room service at 5pm one day as room hadn t been serviced Expected a lot more from the Hilton
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed Excellent location

Negative_Review: The noise from Wembly stadium could be heard in the room knowing it was to be so close maybe better sound design would have been wise
Positive_Review: I really liked the art work in the bedrooms it was unusual and sophisticated

Negative_Review: Late check out of 14 00 would have been great but I do understand that the rooms must be clean for the next guests

Positive_Review: Great help and politeness by Martin in reception and Chantelle in the executive lounge

Negative_Review: Lifts but they had event at Wembley so understandable besides that nothing

Negative_Review: No Negative

Negative_Review: No Negative

Negative_Review: The car park right next to the hotel for the arena was very expensive
Positive_Review: Next door to the arena we were going to so perfect location nice park for children and we enjoyed the pool as well

Positive_Review: The overall experience was fab Great customer service and room was ideal Loved the furnishings of the bathroom

Negative_Review: Nothing
