Positive_Review: Location for gig in Wembley Reception staff Bathrooms

Negative_Review: Issue with someone else s bar bill being charged to our account Staff decided it was an error but charged to our credit card anyway
Positive_Review: Excellent executive lounge with good choice of food and drinks View of Wembley stadium

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: absolutely fantastic staff at the front desk could not have been more helpful we got there early and i had booked a king size room the lady at the front desk said she could offer me a check in now for a queen room and gave me access to the lounge and a complimentary breakfast because the room wasn t what i booked as you can imagine we were very happy with this and the room we got was fantastic xx

Negative_Review: Needs a pool Security at door where rude need to warn people staying at hotel that they need to show room key to get into the hotel Car parking should be free if staying for more than one night No bathrobes
Positive_Review: Bed was very comfy slept well Shower was amazing Reception staff where excellent Impressive room

Negative_Review: Room service A club sandwich which came with fries was a little pricey for my liking but expected at hotels to be fair As its the Hilton I was still happy to pay
Positive_Review: The room itself was spotless the bed was unbelievably comfortable the staff were so kind and extremely helpful the location couldn t of been better for the purpose of my trip

Negative_Review: Noise from tv in the room next door Being woken up in the morning by a cleaner who wanted to clean our room when we were not due to vacate it until mid day was a joke especially as we lost sleep the night before
Positive_Review: The staff at reception were faultless Comfortable room Plus complimentary breakfast and a bottle of wine for my wifes 60th birthday was appreciated too

Negative_Review: The sky bar snacks were limited in selection and not as appetising as I expected Also when showering the water was not at constant heat set by myself or partner and would often fluctuate between hot to tepid was that much of a pleasure although we were still happy to just get on with it
Positive_Review: A spacious and welcoming reception in foyer with approachable and knowledge staff at front desk The hotel room was clean and the bed was very comfy

Negative_Review: Check inn with the lady seemed tedious wasn t sure if she was new but kept looking at her colleague for prompts Just felt a little harassed uncomfortable taking longer than expected I had to politely cut off the lady as I was tiered keen to get to my room Also when passing the reception to go to the shop back again was aware the same lady was watching me
Positive_Review: The offer of upgrade to a King room which was modern very clean spacious comfortable Bonous was a great view of the stadium

Negative_Review: Nothing except shower in washroom didn t work properly but manager at front desk sorted it immediately and compensated us with complimentary breakfast Excellent staff and happy with treatment Sorry their computers are slow and behind the times need updated The staff would appreciate it more
Positive_Review: Visiting Wembley and this was best and closest hotel Holland national team was staying at hotel which made it special Room was basic comfortable and spacious Front desk and lobby staff very helpful especially the concierge Paul who was polite helpful and assisted me with printing boarding passes for my onward journey He was first class and went beyond the call of duty Thank you to Paul great guy

Negative_Review: I was lucky to book early to get a ok deal But the prices of a night stay is a bit steep for a family However you get what you pay for and this is certainly a good example of that Everything is easy and top quality and after all I guess you are in London as well
Positive_Review: If you are going to a game in Wembley then this is the way to do it Location is just amazing You can t get any better Hotel staff are excellent Rooms bar rooms are great as you would expect from a Hilton hotel Parking is very easy Overall everything is just made easy and great for you if you are attending an England game

Negative_Review: The Sky bar was closed on the day of the football which was very disappointing that was the whole reason I booked this hotel for that view so I was very unhappy the drinks in the hotel bar are extremely expensive but it was London
Positive_Review: Everything the hotel is very nice the staff are polite the rooms are ery clean and very comfy

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very basic rooms bit clean modern and comfy Could of just done with that something extra to make it glam considering a premier inn offer the same for less

Negative_Review: The view as there wasn t any We were on level 5 and we looked straight out onto a side of the building It made the room very dark
Positive_Review: Where the hotel was situated Very comfortable accommodation Clean room Helpful staff

Negative_Review: The water pressure in the shower was a bit low A suggestion is that special hours for adults is introduced in the pool area lets say from 7 pm When I went down for a swim the level of noise and splashing made me leave pretty quick
Positive_Review: Professional and friendly staff The hotel was located near the tube and grocery store The bar and gym at the hotel was also great

Negative_Review: Shower was leaking need to be fixed TV has wrong remote control I was expecting hilton bathrobe and slippers did not get them
Positive_Review: Good location friendly staff Spacious room Swimming pool on site all in one hotel

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room was excellent plenty of space sometime you can find cities hotel rooms to be small feel like a box but not at this hotel Didn t have time to use the pool and sauna but looked very nice clean and everthing looked new

Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: Everything was excellent Even the staff were great and very helpful Even after we had to cancel the second night due to my partner having a fall and having to go to hospital

Negative_Review: The only moan i have was there was no kettle in my room After travelling for hours i was gasping for a coffee but was shocked to see no kettle in my room
Positive_Review: Very clean and tidy

Negative_Review: I didn t like the fact you could hear the people next door talking and that you could hear the fans singing at 3 am and nothing was done about it
Positive_Review: I liked how friendly the staff were how clean and tidy the room was the location was key for me really as I was at a football game

Negative_Review: Had to leave pool early as someone else broke a glass by the pool side and didn t get to use facilitates as we wanted to This was our First time trying here and didn t even get any comlamentreys to say sorry for the unconvinced
Positive_Review: The bed was extra comfy

Negative_Review: Organisation was not impressive at all Slow check in As a resident access to the bar pre and post match was farcical and totally disorganised Breakfast also disorganised chaos Queing for a table when there were plenty available just not enough staff to clear them
Positive_Review: Location as attended cuo final match at Wembley Stadium

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Rooms staff were really helpful even let us extend our room by two hours free of charge as my friend and I had completed the vitality north London half marathon at Wembley so we re able to come back to shower before heading home we had a glass of champers in the bar

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Great staff great location Very comfortable If you are doing anything at Wembley book here Nice selection of restaurants and shops next door to browse around

Negative_Review: I ate fish salmon in the restaurant and was not able to sleep during the night because of stomach pain I stayed awake almost all night but the staff was very nice to me Cleanness could be improved in the spa area The bathroom s layout could be improved this layout is outdated
Positive_Review: The staff was lovely very nice polite The room has everything you could ever need comfy bed and pillow

Negative_Review: Came all the way to London for a special occasion but got ruined cause off 2 reasons 1 They couldn t find my booking on their system eventually after half hour they had found my reservation under my guests name 2 The view from our room which was a courtyard looking into other rooms
Positive_Review: Location was perfect plenty of shops and places to eat out

Negative_Review: The room s condition in general The water flow from the taps is poor and they couldn t fix it despite my almost daily complaint
Positive_Review: The location and staff

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The close proximity to Wembley Stadium for our stadium tour Parking special price through hotel and not far from The Designer Outlet shopping centre cineworld

Negative_Review: unable to gain access to roof bar due to private party View from bedroom window staring at a wall
Positive_Review: swimming pool sauna steam room morning breakfast nice room and comfortable bed

Negative_Review: After arena event the lifts were full and took ages to get one to come back to ground floor as people were going up escalators to catch lift in its way down to go up Only one tea bag in a large pot Making for a very weak tea
Positive_Review: Location decor and staff

Negative_Review: Bar was very crowded we gave up in the end and used the room s minibar
Positive_Review: Being really near to Wembley Arena Nice area for wandering eating etc staff at hotel very friendly Nice breakfast room

Negative_Review: Bar staff were very slow to notice people waiting to be served as they seemed to be focussed more on their own conversation Not very well stocked bar either 3 drinks asked for could not be given due to lack of basic staples including just a simple glass of Merlot
Positive_Review: The pillows were the most comfortable I ve ever slept on Breakfast was great also

Negative_Review: The spa health facilities were a little small especially for the size of the hotel Very tiny pool
Positive_Review: The hotel was great very clean and comfortable The breakfast had a really nice variety and the staff are very accommodating

Negative_Review: I was advised to stay in my room when I kept on asking for things and I was treated like a threat to the hotel when I kept getting lost and ended up in the kitchen It was the most horrible experience I ever had I felt like a prisoner and mental health hospital
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The service and restaurant was very poor We have stayed here twice before and had an excellent time The service in the restaurant was awful and terribly slow The standard of the wine has dramatically fallen The food took ages to arrive and was overpriced Eg I ordered scallops and received two of the tiniest scallops I have ever Sen on sbed of green mush for over 12 pounds It took 50 minutes to arrive The couple next to us had a meal that arrived cold after a 50 minute wait Much better friendly service and food from pizza express 10 yards away
Positive_Review: Excellent location good check in staff Good facilities

Negative_Review: Breakfast was a bit unexciting and food could have been hotter But it was very busy as it was the Liverpool v City final
Positive_Review: Really comfy bed and pillows Big bonus that Liverpool FC were staying Lots of fans waiting patiently for a glimpse of their team were treated to free orange juice or apple juice Excellent move by the hotel

Negative_Review: Disorganised booking in time 3pm next to Britains premier stadium what time kick off The Bar had a half hour wait to get in so if you want a p prepare for another wait disorganised to say the least
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: The service in the restaurant was very slow it took 40 minutes for our drinks to arrive We then had mouldy fruit in our dessert which was changed but it did put me off eating it
Positive_Review: The hotel was lovely great location good size rooms which were very clean and beds were comfy

Negative_Review: Room service phone always engaged Customer services said they would get them to ring back but they never did
Positive_Review: Really comfy very big bed Helpful check in staff Excellent location for Wembley

Negative_Review: Our bedrooms were very basic not what we expected for the price we paid Also our rooms were on the 6th floor and we were very disappointed not to be able to use our mobile phones or any other devices without them cutting out The WiFi was very unstable Again not acceptable for the price we paid We mentioned the problem when we were checking out to be told this sometimes happens let us know next time you stay at the HLW
Positive_Review: Convenient for Wembley football stadium Reception bar staff very helpful

Negative_Review: We have not had a fridge in the room remotely locked by reception before and given that our fresh milk for early morning tea was inside was a little annoying Also there was no toilet brush surely a requirement for every bathroom
Positive_Review: The room was comfortable well planned with an attractive bathroom It was spacious and well lit

Negative_Review: The staff attitude and aptitude in the bar and restaurant at times left a lot to be desired 1 or 2 were very good but on balance getting their attention or even some cutlery seemed to be too much to ask
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The cost of drinks at the bar were rather a lot plus didn t know that were charged a 10 service charge on drinks purchased until read the receipt
Positive_Review: The atmosphere lovely classy appearance of hotel friendy genuine staff bed very roomy comfortable Told that we were upgraded to a deluxe room on arrival was very nice

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent reception staff didn t have to wait at all We were upgraded to a double room lovely view When we were checking out there was a bit of a wait and a very helpful chap casket if he could help and validated the car park ticket Great bar and views

Negative_Review: Bar prices eye wateringly expensive Dont bother with the bar there are tesco and sainsbury nearby
Positive_Review: Ideal for Wembley arena Excellent room at a very good price

Negative_Review: There was a very long wait at check in with only 2 staff and a greeter It would have been better to have had 3 check in staff The Skybar was closed which was very dissapointing The bedroom had no view at all Only a cooling tower or wall of some sort
Positive_Review: The bed was extra comfy The breakfast was excellent and the bar was attractive

Negative_Review: Staff very slow to take dinner order Too few bar staff for after gig drinks so long waiting time
Positive_Review: Good rooms and decent pool Great for Wembley Arena and designer shops Food excellent

Negative_Review: Disappointed that the night manager seemed to target our group which ultimately spoiled our evening After being alerted that our music was too loud out of respect for other guests of the hotel we turned the music off not down The night staff deemed it necessary to continuously patrol on the floor we were staying on Inevitably the next knock at the door came and we were told that if we didn t go back to our own rooms we would have to find alternative accommodation As a group we knew we had kept the noise levels down to a minimum and even the people who were in the next room came out to say the only persons voice they could hear was that of the night manager I proceeded to ask if there had been another complaint about the level of noise coming from from the room which the night manager responded I don t have to answer that As a result our party decided it would be in everybody s best interest if we went back to our rooms After all we didn t want to be paying a rate of 165 per night with no bed to sleep on which was what we were threatened with Spoiled what is our only weekend away of the year Apart from that the hotel is in a great location and majority of the staff are very welcoming
Positive_Review: Facilities staff on arrival and hotel on the whole was fantastic

Negative_Review: Mouldy grapes in the mini bar left by another guest left an unpleasant smell in the room but was swiftly sorted once room service was called
Positive_Review: It was quiet in our room heard no noise from the hotel or other guests doors banging

Negative_Review: The view out the window was a wall Some dust on the bedside tables mini bar wasn t stocked and we would of been charged
Positive_Review: The big clean bathroom the food staff were friendly big bed

Negative_Review: The swimming pool is a little small the steam room sauna were both quite small as well was having to move around quite frequently to let other people have a turn
Positive_Review: The room was well presented for us to be welcomed into with rose petals on the bed a lovely complementary bottle of wine The staff were very polite helpful

Negative_Review: I stayed at the Hilton Wembley with my girlfriend several times and enjoyed my stay This time it was on Valentine s Day of this year It was also the first time I have made a request with them Which was a simple one for a bottle of wine and some chocolates to be in our room up arrival Despite emailing them twice this request was not only denied but it was also completely ignored So I arrived unsure of whether this day would be made that bit more special for my girlfriend and I This was not an extravagant request and had been granted upon staying at other hotels such as Novotel Wembley on other special occasions However the least I would expect would be the decency of a reply from staff In the morning we were woken with a ridiculously loud message on the speaker warning us that a situation was in progress and we should wait for further announcements This continued for approximately 10 minutes without anything else being said until another message came up advising us it was safe to return to the hotel reception I am not sure what the problem may have been but as a matter of safety and judging by the last message given it could ve potentially been serious Therefore I believe all guests should have been told to stay in their rooms and wait for further announcements Due to our experience at this stay I believe The Hilton failed to meet the high standards they claim to have and in doing so have lost a loyal guest I can not express my disappoint any more
Positive_Review: The room was of the normal high standard the Hilton are known for but that was about the only pleasant experience during our stay

Negative_Review: Service in Icons bar was very poor Staff were slow and overwhelmed even when not busy Tables not cleared and bar cluttered with used plates and glasses Not very inviting Bar food average
Positive_Review: Clean room and great location for venue Polite staff

Negative_Review: On arrival we were greeted kindly and reassured the wait for reception would be as short as possible by the concierge however as he then directed us to a free receptionist another traveler obviously with little manners walked straight into the Hotel and up to the desk we again waited for a free assistant the concierge again offered us forward the receptionist then answered the phone and we had to wait a while longer I find this extremely rude and unprofessional and believe that a physically present human being should always without exception be dealt with first and foremost
Positive_Review: The location was perfect for our stay and the Hotel was lovely and modern we had two perfectly nice nights sleep in a very comfy bed

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Check in was 3pm but we arrived at 12 30pm to find our room all ready and waiting The staff were very helpful As we were attending Wembley arena for a concert which was straight across the road was fantastic If we were to attend another concert or for the football I would be booking this hotel again

Negative_Review: Guests that walk around the executive lounge in their night wear have they no shame
Positive_Review: Executive room great value comfortable huge bed lovely furnishings Parking easy 15 a day

Negative_Review: The air conditioning heating was noisy so I turned it off
Positive_Review: A very nice room The self service breakfast was first class and the staff very helpful

Negative_Review: Personally I found the bed and pillows uncomfortable but then there is nothing like your own bed
Positive_Review: We were a group of friends staying as we were going to the Strictly Tour at the SSE Arena which is right opposite the hotel staff extremely helpful friendly Rooms very nice clean and we were able to get into our rooms earlier than the normal check in time Breakfast was very good every possible option was catered for

Negative_Review: Table booked at Icon Restaurant and meal failed to show up after waiting 1 hour had to leave to get to show on time next door at Wembly Arena One restaurant and one bar closed No explaination given by hotel
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Seems severely understaffed long waits for service at reception bar Food service seemed non existent Eventually gave up on getting room service at 10 50pm and went out to McDonalds Stuffy bedroom
Positive_Review: Staff friendly Room very clean Great location Excellent coffee

Negative_Review: The Hotel seemed as though they were under staffed to the amount of staff they had last year I had requested if it was possible a room close to the lifts and I had an email confirming my request but when we arrived the only way to do this was to put a single bed into a double room which was close to the lifts but then we would have had less space to move around so sadly we had to decline The family guest room which we were booked into was too FAR away from the lifts and there isn t a family room close to the lifts so it was hard work as myself and my mum are disabled and we really struggled getting to and from and ended up having Room service for all of us as it was too far for us to walk The quality of the room service food was of a very disappointing standard especially for the price and we couldnt eat it where as last year we couldn t complain about the room service food Also the room cards didn t work when we got to our room and I had to find a telephone to ring reception and wait for another card to be brought up to us I Think that it is wrong that my HHonours from last year does not count as I didn t book straight through the Hotel but surely IF YOU HAVE PAID AND STAYED IN THE HOTEL THEN YOU DESERVE TO HAVE THE RECCOGNITION WHETHER IT IS BOOKED DIRECTLY OR NOT
Positive_Review: The hotel is situated brilliantly for Wembley Stadium and Wembley Arena the staff were friendly and seemed to mean it when greeting you etc and they didn t just seem like they were Robots saying the same sentence to everyone The cleanliness was fantastic and the room was nice and spacious which was great

Negative_Review: The evening meal service pre show was poor The front of house did their best but the food couldn t come quick enough As soon as we ordered we were told it d be a 20 25 min wait This was 15mins after the resaurant opened Took 40 mins for our food to arrive Other tables never recieved their food in time Given the location I was expecting a service geared towards guests attending events at the arena or stadium When the food did arrive it was excellent but there was obviously a staffing capacity issue
Positive_Review: Location room breakfast were great Staff were friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: The biscuits in the room all contained nuts being someone who has a nut allergy this is not accounted for Maybe a choice is something that could be looked into
Positive_Review: Breakfast was amazing service friendly couldn t fault it

Negative_Review: The breakfast is poor The eggs were packet eggs the bacon very fatty and cheap and it was very disappointing
Positive_Review: Icon bar was really relaxed and just what we were looking for for a pre show drink Location is beyond excellent and the staff were lovely

Negative_Review: I am nitpicking but our view from the room wasn t fantastic Our room was a bit far from the ice machine and lifts and It is a little far from Wembley station None of those things would deter me from staying there again though
Positive_Review: Really enjoyed my stay at the Hilton Room was great and was really close to restaurants Would definitely stay again

Negative_Review: Wish we could have opened a window
Positive_Review: Third time staying here definitely recommended Lovely clean modern hotel in nice location right beside a good selection of shops and restaurants Short walk to tube station too

Negative_Review: Bathroom was not as clean as expected from a 5 hotel Toilet had urine stain on seat Would be great if bathroom slippers were provided
Positive_Review: Friendly staff great breakfast very comfortable room

Negative_Review: Nothing to not like
Positive_Review: VERY GOOD LOCATION FOR PARKING AND GETTING INTO LONDON EXCELLENT ROOM AND REALY HELPFUL STAFF GOOD VALUE WE WILL MAKE MORE USE OF THE LEISURE FACILITIES NEXT TIME

Negative_Review: The staff at the fitness centre swimming pool part were quite rude I bought a nose clip from there and the woman who served me took my card to use in the machine and tapped it on the card machine thinking it was contactless without asking my permission Then when I left my towel on the table by the swimming pool by accident and let the staff know I said sorry and I said I hope that s not too bad and very rudely a woman replied of course its a problem but I will deal with it So I did not like the attitude of the staff
Positive_Review: The bed was very big and very comfy which made the stay comfortable The use of the swimming pool sauna and steam room for free was also very good

Negative_Review: Swimming pool is dirty and some rooms have no view at all Sometimes price is super expensive to stay
Positive_Review: Staff are friendly rooms are very clean Great location to stay Facilities in room are brilliant

Negative_Review: Group booking rooms weren t on same floor The alarm that went off stating there was an emergency but wasn t told what was going on or what to do
Positive_Review: The interior The facilities The location

Negative_Review: The bathroom was for disabled people which was not comfortable The room and specially the bathroom were not clean
Positive_Review: Very friendly and helpful staff on the reception Restaurant staff were also very nice Swimming pool was good but unfortunately crowded

Negative_Review: The fee at the car park a little high Breakfast was warm would be nice If it was hot
Positive_Review: Room was very comfortable and clean Staff are friendly and helpful We really enjoyed our stay

Negative_Review: 1 Safe in room wasn t working 2 Very poor slow service in the Legends bar at one point there were people waiting for nearly 15 minutes to be served and there was only one barman present around midnight Also as reported to hotel management there were some very dodgy practices going on especially by one bar man I have the name and time of this on receipt that is adding 10 service charge automatically and then not explaining why it was being added nor giving the opportunity for it to be removed even though it should be discretionary Further he rounded up the bill so he said that s 8 50 gave change of 1 50 when the bill said 8 25 in other words a nice little earner for him if he did that each time throughout the night
Positive_Review: The location is fantastic for events at the Stadium and Arena Easy access into Central London Service by majority of the staff there was very good

Negative_Review: However I did ask for a chocolate on my pillow as special request to my MD s to get me in the good books But you didn t Daymmmm
Positive_Review: I was in breakfast heaven The sausages were fantastic 2 types of bacon black pudding AND Nutella muffin We went on a conference meeting and the staff were fantastic I was never without bottled water

Negative_Review: The shower head was leaking at the seal where it attaches to the hose so the pressure was down Also the gym was abit small and struggled to get on a machine in the morning
Positive_Review: liked the room bed really comfy

Negative_Review: Price is steep considering no breakfast included Parking is extra and no information was given by staff Drinks in bar are expensive
Positive_Review: Location very close to SSE arena Wembley arena restaurants Large rooms beds

Negative_Review: The room wasn t clean got a ticket from parking in bay where reception confirmed I could sorted out by Hilton in the end Staff where helpful but ONLY after I raised my displeasure
Positive_Review: The hotel is ideally located to the area a stadium and outlet stores

Negative_Review: Public areas were overcrowded with non staying people waiting for taxis after event at sse arena No seats available at the icons grill for food or drink was like being in a rowdy club Restaurant was at capacity and room service was severely overpriced at 8 ish for a hot sandwich 5 50 for a glass of wine and then a 5 tray charge Especially steep when room service is the only option STAFF ARE ALL OUTSTANDING X
Positive_Review: The staff were lovely nothing was too much trouble

Negative_Review: Booking com told me total price was 164 On arrival Hilton staff charged me 204 However with a late arrival and going to see a show I payed Morning after spent an hour trying to sort out why I was charged more eventually was told the difference would be reimbursed Missed out on a few hours sight seeing Was not and still not pleased with service
Positive_Review: Rooms were very spacious view was nice and in brilliant location

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Exec room with lounge access was definitely worth the extra money Perfect location opposite the SSE Arena and parking 15 when ticket validated on check out

Negative_Review: The minibar was empty the surfaces in our room were covered in dust the bed was possibly harder than concrete and I spent the weekend with a bad back because of it
Positive_Review: Location was very good right next to the SSE arena which was the purpose of the trip Staff were very helpful and friendly

Negative_Review: location it was too far away from London central and there weren t so many things to see around either than Wembley Stadium the operator was often busy on the line I had to call more than 3 or 4 times just for a simple information question I felt like the receptionist was a bit too lazy to provide me with some information about London as it was my first time visiting I really needed bit of information for sight seeing etc she told me to get a brochure by myself and eventually I gained no information from her during our stay there was a christmas eve party Due to the noise I couldn t sleep so I set in the lobby around 3am where I found 2 drunk girls disturbing me I think that the hotel should also consider other guests by not holding a loud noisy and unpleasant event
Positive_Review: Most staff members were nice but it would ve been better if every staff were greeting with a smile and make us feel more welcomed and comfortable

Negative_Review: Had to change rooms as there was no hot water in my room the showers was not functioning correctly should have offered me a free meal or something for the inconvenience
Positive_Review: Hotel was modern and clean as well as being well equiped

Negative_Review: The front staff were not nice and very unhelpful at the front desk They demanded we paid straight away and said that is their policy the year before that was not the case The food in the executive lounge was not as good as last year Last year they had really nice Indian treats
Positive_Review: The hotel was nice and clean Most of the staff were very accommodating and welcoming The Christmas dinner was nice but the year before we had lovely decorations on the table which we did not have this Christmas The bell boy was a star we wanted to be near to our family and he arranged it when the front desk tried be very difficult in making the changes The bell boy persued on our behalf and we got upgraded to a suite This bellboy should be the manager he knows how to keep people happy especially at Christmas I wanted to see him again to find out his name so I could commend him to his manager

Negative_Review: The hotel had a huge number of Underground workers and their families staying men were working on Xmas Day families crowded around reception area chatting making it difficult for guests to check in Porter spent whole time looking at mobile while I struggled with bags Manager apologised
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Perhaps a faster more efficient service upon checking in Very disorganised and the relentless questions from the staff 25 minutes to check in Hardly any reception staff
Positive_Review: The location and comfort of the hotel

Negative_Review: Felt a little cold attention to customer service would be beneficial on arrival and departure room generally tidy but attention to detail as dust and hairs visible Otherwise all fine
Positive_Review: Easy access to local venue Room was a good size bed comfortable general facilities in room good

Negative_Review: In the restaurant on level 3 the Icons bar and the Executive Lounge it was very cold and draughty The heating was difficult to control in the bedroom It was either too hot or too cold
Positive_Review: The executive room was very well designed and actually had a mirror above the dressing table and plugs for my hairdryer The bathroom was well designed also The shower was very good

Negative_Review: The cost of parking in the area If you are taking your car in and out of the recommended car park the hotel has no reduced price deal The result is a cost of a mere 5 an hour
Positive_Review: Good well equipped room with a great view

Negative_Review: Was advised room service does not serve hot snacks meals like burger and fries and there was no hot chocolate in the room which I thought would have been standard Also bedside cabinet was a bit sticky
Positive_Review: Nice comfy big bed Stadium view Close to Macdonalds which was a Godsend something hot to eat

Negative_Review: Couldn t make tea or coffee as the uht milk tasted off
Positive_Review: Friendly helpful staff Room was clean and had everything we needed Bed was so comfortable Perfect for Wembley arena as literally next door

Negative_Review: The service at dinner was very poor we only had one course in the end
Positive_Review: It was fabulous The breakfast and dinner was delicious Having Andre Rieu and his JSO there at the same time was awesome I forgot my skirt there and it was kindly posted to me

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Immediately next to the vicinity of Wembley arena Especially with the poor weather and my elderly mother who cannot walk far The staff upgraded us to a better room and had the beds changed from a double to twins immediately Exceptionally friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: The fact that the room we had only had a view of a wall wasn t so great and the fact that neither of us could get any kind of phone signal from inside the room was exceptionally bad If we wanted to make phone calls we had to go out of the hotel In addition we ordered room service one night after leaving a concert at the arena and when the waiter delivered it he noticed that we had a map of the tube open on our laptop Spotting this he said Oh you re figuring out where to put the bomb Cue the blank stares However the rest of the staff we met and interacted with were generally quite pleasant
Positive_Review: Ease of accessing the free wi fi was really good as was the turn down of the room on a daily basis There was always stocks of tea biscuits and bathroom products in the room as well The close proximity to the arena and the stadium was really beneficial for us and not only that but the place is also close enough to a few shops and restaurants so everything we needed was close enough by

Negative_Review: Issues with the bellboy refusing to help with my luggage as he was Too busy swiftly Dealt with by reception Beautiful room great bathroom only gripe was broken shower wall unit which meant I couldn t adjust the height very simple should have been noticed by cleaners and dealt with beforehand i was only staying for one night so didn t want to be bothered by repairs in the room No big issue a great hotel
Positive_Review: Breakfast was great loads of choice Very tasty Gym staff were helpful and the equipment was of high standard A little pricey but would stay again

Negative_Review: Not enough staff on in the bar area had to wait a long time for our snacks Bathroom in our room was very smelly on arrival had an unclean odour to it Food and drinks were very expensive Not enough options for a vegan diet
Positive_Review: Hotel and staff were excellent Location perfect for venue

Negative_Review: Poor facilities in the executive lounge Very slow bar staff in the bar waited half hour for a drink
Positive_Review: Good location for our trip Friendly staff at check in

Negative_Review: I didn t like the parking arrangement the cost of parking and the cost of doing anything in the hotel like eating Definitely for corporates with big budgets Not consultants who pay for their own expenses
Positive_Review: It was clean and the facilities were good

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We stayed here as part of my girlfriends birthday weekend and I also proposed to her The staff were more than helpful and helped with the surprise absolutely brilliant

Negative_Review: Tv channels need sorting out reinstalling and the shower kept going from hot to cold at times
Positive_Review: Great price huge comfortable bed and beautiful room with great facilities in the hotel

Negative_Review: Unhelpful male Manager on the front desk during check in and ignored me when there was a problem with my key card on a separate occasion Poor lazy attitude overall There were Several other problems including being removed from my room and downgraded to a shabby room twice by the same male Manager Rooms smelt damp because you can t open the windows and generally unclean unless you complain To date never been refunded for a forthcoming four night stay from 29 Jan 2016 even though a refund had been requested and submitted to the Director of Operations because of past poor service during several previous stays Never Again I recently checked into a local hotel and guess what Not a single bottle of free alcohol on offer Apparently one local hotel stole the entire shipload in order to keep disgruntled guests happy So I m told
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: First we ask for a double king bed and we got two small beds we asked for a upper floor but got the lowest floor food in the bar not too tasty the menu in the room is nice but the one in the bar very poor choice and the food not so tasty they advertise a sky bar but is never open the pool small and dirty Except reception every department in special bar have short and unexperience staff The New Year party was the worst we wait at the bar at least 45 min for every drink and managers just standing at the end of the bar not helping or organising anything bathroom disgusting photto to prove Never again going back
Positive_Review: The hotel was in good location looks very nice and modern

Negative_Review: no batteries in remote trays of food left in corridors quite some time it took me almost 10 min on the phone to find out the name of the closest tube station
Positive_Review: very helpful friendly staff

Negative_Review: I have made it somewhat of a tradition to stay here around the time of my lady s birthday which is also close to our anniversary This is the third time we have stayed and we always look forward to a beautiful dinner served in the beautiful restaurant facility that the building has This time however we were sorely displeased to be dining in the bar opposite as it lacked the atmosphere of romance that initially made us fall in love with staying and dining at Hilton Wembley
Positive_Review: As it was a birthday treat for my other half I requested some birthday cake and we arrived to see it waiting on the desk That was very pleasant and appreciated

Negative_Review: Everything from the slow check in to the noises outside the bedroom to the loud cleaners down to the equally slow check out Why are they a four star rated hotel charging rates they can t support and deliver in customer service standards No conventional class about the hotel Cheap and tacky place selling rooms with disgusting views unless you are fortunate to get a stadium view room Mislead by online photos Never again
Positive_Review: Nothing stands out

Negative_Review: Rooms were unclean apology followed by some fat manager who just nodded at our complaints the sort you just want to head butt because he really doesn t care but sent to offer you a menu of insincere apologies plus four bottles of wine in the hope you get drunk and stop bothering him Morning scrambled eggs looked like snot two days running in executive lounge Ripe off Frustrating time overall
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: Nothing great beyond the lobby lights That s as good as it got all downhill from the lifts upwards Three parties over the course of the stay made the place unsuitable plus told to vacate room second night into the stay happens all the time I was told and placed in an inferior room with no compensation to date Director of Operations was useless to date beyond saying he was sorry Got offered cheap nasty wine Standard by the looks of it and kept on standby for such musical room moments Awful room views Depressing time
Positive_Review: Bright and shinny lights in lobby

Negative_Review: Oversized bloke with oversized glasses who was upon check in Rude lazy bored disinterested looking and unhelpful front desk male manager The type that clocks in and clocks out for his shift and just simply turns up to work to collect his pay cheque each month and knows he will never be fired from his cosy job but just getting by with doing the minimum by the looks of it The clip board idiot Poor customer service
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Bed was a little bit hard Staffs were kind but there should have been someone who directly takes care of customer s needs When I requested to search for my lost stuff it took much longer time to solve it because they just asked to someone involved in house keeping and relied on the answers If the staffs initially went to the room and search it directly the lost stuffs would have been easily found
Positive_Review: Executive lounge has good selection of quality foods Complimentary breakfast has limited range compared to buffet breakfast in 3rd floors But it was quite enough to start a day In the evening from 18 00 evening snacks and drinks are served which is quite enough to have a dinner One bedroom suite was very clean and has modern design Sauna and steam room was also good

Negative_Review: The spa facilities were quite basic and could of been better The pool was cold not heated
Positive_Review: The hotel was lovely and clean Very modern and stylish and finished to a high standard The staff were lovely and friendly

Negative_Review: had to change rooms because no hotter it was defective shower Staff just say yes but do not always understand seems a bit of a cultural language issue
Positive_Review: Most everything

Negative_Review: Not having free internet in our room
Positive_Review: We liked every thing about our stay specially the executive lounge but free internet with the executive suite booking would have been the icing on the cake

Negative_Review: Christmas dinner was a flop I ordered braised lamb Couldn t eat it as it was tasteless A real disappointment as this was the main reason for our stay
Positive_Review: Location was good hotel clean room large staff helpful Great experience having a sauna and steam

Negative_Review: The room where we stayed was very noise upstairs for the two nights and part of the ceiling near the door fell off on us and then there were no water for a couple of hours I got the room on a deal and was very upset to see that if I had paid full price i would ve asked for a refund
Positive_Review: The executive lounge

Negative_Review: How can you possibly think it is appropriate to allow a private function on top floor to have loud music heard throughout the hotel until 2am And on Christmas morning Other than that our stay was what we needed and loved
Positive_Review: Courteous and helpful staff especially Daiva at restaurant

Negative_Review: For the first time since I have been staying at the hotel the service in the Ambassador restaurant was extremely slow this did not effecte me as I had booked an early dinner so had plenty of time others did not Maybe staff off sick at last moment can happen anywhere
Positive_Review: Convenience to where I was going Ease of booking in and out Choices for food and drinks and where to have them and most important comfortable beds

Negative_Review: The rooms bar and the restaurant for dinner were pricey
Positive_Review: Well run clean hotel with friendly staff Excellent breakfast buffet The breakfast was good value

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I didn t realise until I arrived that I had been upgraded to an executive room which included breakfast my initial booking was for a standard room without meals so it was a lovely surprise

Negative_Review: Very minor bathroom vanity top not been cleaned
Positive_Review: Quality of acommodation room fittings and facilities all excellent also hotel situated so close to venues perfect

Negative_Review: Only two problems with this hotel 1 The rooms air conditioning in the bedroom would not go below 18 degrees c making it excessively hot to try and sleep in but the worse thing was the bar In the hour and a half we were in there it took 20 minutes to get a drink The staff used their hands to add lemon or lime to the drinks When spirits were measured they tipped most of the drink over their fingers Beer glasses were upturned and stacked on the drip trays prior to being filled so they were contaminated around the rim None of the staff ever washed their hands No second sink for tap water so this also was cross contaminated with general grime and rubbish Orders were wrong constantly with at least 3 couples complaining to the manager in the time we were there Bottle tops were thrown on the floor making a serious slipping hazard for the staff all of which had a serious lack of understanding of English For a four star hotel it was disgusting which is why we chose not to eat there Oh and at some point the beer prices went up by a 0 50 a pint for no reason
Positive_Review: Bedroom was big and comfy Great location for Wembley

Negative_Review: The cleanliness lacked thereof There was a tray and plate left outside a room on the corridor for at least 10 hours and when we had breakfast there was many tables that needed clearing and cleaning which I would expect immediately considering how much customers pay for the stay and services at the hotel
Positive_Review: The service we received was excellent the breakfast was nice

Negative_Review: Coffee really bad Hotel hot and stuffy Long wait to check in Wifi not good in room Only got one biscuit and 2 sachets of coffee in room
Positive_Review: Clean and comfortable good location for Wembley arena

Negative_Review: Someone had left an opened tub of pomegranate in the fridge Judging by the sell by date of a month before our stay it could have been there some time Maybe it was a gift off the Hotel had been frozen prior to our arrival We didn t take that chance At the bar a beer with a wine soda 16 50 only 5 64 at the nearby Torch pub
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel is approximately 20 paces from the SSE Arena door to door where we came for a music event It is also within a stone s throw of the Stadium This may sound like it could be a negative but in no way did it have any adverse effect on our experience inside the hotel

Negative_Review: Our shower head was broken loose Paying for water was terrible concidering the price i paid for the room
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent and the hotel beautiful

Negative_Review: Only thing I can comment on is some sort of air con possibly noise which was a little annoying But wasn t that bad as we didn t investigate it to see if we could change it
Positive_Review: Fast efficient friendly check in plus facilities for express checkout in the morning which was handy

Negative_Review: Nothing to fault
Positive_Review: The hotel was very clean the rooms were nice and big and the staff were very friendly The hotel was in the perfect location for the Wembley Arena Fantastic hotel

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Lovely room good size enormous bed cannot fault it Gorgeous selection at breakfast eggs made to order great coffee Had a nice little swim in the pool steam and sauna to follow Literally next to Wembley Arena so THE perfect place to stay if you re going to a gig which we were

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful especially the concierge who s name unfortunately has slipped my mind He was very helpful and went out of his way to sort an error with my friends parking fee

Negative_Review: No hairdryer thought this was standard Breakfast was excellent but only downfall was a family with 2 young children that they couldn t control Running around screaming not good
Positive_Review: Rooms were spacious and clean Even had a clock in room which is fab

Negative_Review: I paid 126 for the room which I d booked in November I am aware that the earlier you book the better value you get but I do think that this was a little pricey for just a one night stay also for this price I felt it should have included a free breakfast The only other minor gripe I have was that the free WiFi was complicated to access
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely friendly the hotel is located in a perfect place for events at Wembley Stadium and Wembley Arena and is a short walk less than 10 mins from Wembley Park Tube station

Negative_Review: Wedding at the hilton had loud music until the early hours keeping us up Our water was cut off at 10 00am 2 hours before leaving time so couldnt have showers
Positive_Review: Nice bathroom

Negative_Review: The cleaners entered are room while we were at breakfast on the morning of checking out before we checked out and took the program and threw it in the trash it was my little brothers who was very upset A unforgivable mistake Room was dustier then expected
Positive_Review: The location was perfect right next to the event we went to and the London Designer Outlet which was handy for meals

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Kind courteous staff always willing to help go that extra mile for you Great room Perfect for Wembley Stadium Arena Very close to station tubes Very close to shops restaurants A very heart felt thank you for a great stay

Negative_Review: Skyline bar wasnt available due to a private function but we had been looking forward to getting a view of wembley so we were disappointed Shower head didnt work on first morning so showering was not easy but this was fixed straight away after reporting it Never enough milk and sugar for your teas coffees in the room
Positive_Review: Locaton was great tube station just a short walk car park for 15per day restaurants and shops right next door and a sainsburys just opposite Rooms were spacious and comfortable and level of cleanliness was extremely high the lifts were even immaculate

Negative_Review: The breakfast had excellent variety but nothing really stood out The food was average at best
Positive_Review: Loved the check in Oscar Iglesias was simply wonderful at making us feel welcome He went out of his way to ensure we had a comfortable stay and has ensured that I remember the Hilton brand from now on As I am a member of other hotel chains I usually tend to seek out those hotels His wonderful service and hospitality has made me a Hilton Honors member for life Other than that our stay was very comfortable and the location is great right next to the London Designer Outlet and Wembley Stadium

Negative_Review: Too many trainees but complete lack of management of the trainees we have waited almost whole breakfast for coffee tea we have complained about the food in the main restaurant absolutely no reaction from the manager of the restaurant we have found in the minibar after 1st day only yoghurt from the breakfast and cup filled with old coffee and it took 3 days to refill the minibar Totally overpriced compared to the quality
Positive_Review: Place reception room itself

Negative_Review: customer service staff smokeing outside in full view not enough staff on bars when checking in no information on anything at all to do with the hotel at all very upset for what we paid it ruined our stay which was special as we were vip s to the x factor
Positive_Review: location

Negative_Review: Breakfast mugs and not a large pot of tea we could sit back and enjoy instead of keep try to catch the eye of waitress for a top up
Positive_Review: Location near Wembley Stadium and access to London

Negative_Review: The mini bar was empty upon arrival and I have since found out that the hotel charged me for the consumption of a whole mini bar despite the fact I didn t have anything to potentially take from it I have since raised this with my bank as an error but I sincerely hope this does not become an issue Unfortunately I cannot afford to spend 70 on alcohol when I am away for business purposes
Positive_Review: The luxury of the rooms the executive lounge and the location for travelling into central London

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: As a wheelchair user all staff were very helpful and disabled room facilities were great Restaurants and shops and arena were right around the corner

Negative_Review: The breakfast is slightly more then I would like to pay but still tasted lovely and plenty of coffee in hand Best scrambled eggs I have ever had from any hotel
Positive_Review: Excellent service from the hotel staff especially the Icon bar manager who made us welcome from the first night and Emilo the barman who was a pleasure to be served by remembered our drinks without prompting each time and has this amazing friendly smile Reception we re very helpful and quick to process my booking Room was available earlier then advised which was very much appreciated Great location and close to tube line for easy access to central London attractions

Negative_Review: n a
Positive_Review: very clean and operated efficiently staff were really friendly and assisted with any queries at a rapid pace location was excellent and a nice view of the stadium from the room

Negative_Review: Bad experience with payment double amount was taken and eventually refunded but this made things difficult for a period of time until the issue was resolved and extra payment returned
Positive_Review: Venue was over the road from my concert venue so I was able to collapse into a comfy sofa straight after dancing and jumping around for 4 hours Breakfast was brilliant too

Negative_Review: Leaving
Positive_Review: From start to finish it was an excellent experience The staff are fantastic the food is great and the facilities ie gym pool sauna etc just brilliant Cant see myself staying anywhere else in the future

Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: I liked everything from the friendly and helpful staff comfort of the hotel and the location The breakfast was one of the best I have had anywhere

Negative_Review: Hotel parking is 15 for 24 hours but not directly on site it s a 2 minute walk outside I told hotel we would be arriving early but room was not ready but we was given access to executive lounge to relax while we waited
Positive_Review: Hotel and staff excellent really clean and made to feel welcome executive lounge was a nice treat also Just outside central London 5 60 on the tube direct to west end for our show Would recommend to every one

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: its a lovely hotel smells incredible and staff were helpful and friendly the room was big the bed was very comfy we were very happy with our room and hotel in general would highly recommend it

Negative_Review: LImited food choices in restauraunt Plus waited too long for food But the food was very nice once it arrived Room was a little cold

Negative_Review: No Negative

Negative_Review: No Negative

Negative_Review: The shower was not amazing for what we paid i expected a little better and the bed was little but to hard
Positive_Review: Location is very nice and security guard on the night shift was very nice and funny room layout very nice Peaceful considering the area and the pool and jacuzzi very nice

Negative_Review: No Negative

Negative_Review: We ordered a taxi to go out on the Saturday night and we were told 10 mins After waiting for 30 mins and speaking to 3 members of your staff we eventually jumped in on that had just pulled up The breakfast experience was terrible food was lovely but we had to accost staff to get coffee or cutlery Most unsatisfactory
Positive_Review: The room was lovely and the bed was huge and super comfortable

Negative_Review: We were staying for a RWC match and decided to eat in as everywhere nearby was busy after the match Ordered room service a sandwich and an omelette They took 45 minutes to arrive and the sandwich was wrong Reported this and was told a replacement would be sent as soon as possible An hour later it hadn t arrived so phoned again Sandwich arrived 15 minutes later Two hours to make a sandwich Not really the Hilton experience you expect
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Poor waiting staff at buffet No leadership Staff mostly in different spoke to supervisor who offered no responsibility

Negative_Review: Our key card for our room kept failling and we had to call the staff to let us in They gave us a complimentary bottle of wine for the inconvenience

Negative_Review: Wifi wasn t much good
Positive_Review: Great location for visiting the area The parking arrangements were helpful in that we could check out and get our parking ticket stamped just before we left the area

Negative_Review: Air conditioning was very noisy Twice tried to call for help and no one picking up Staff at breakfast weren t engaged in serving had to go and chase for tea and coffee coffee never showed up beverage was not self service
Positive_Review: Very comfortable spacious room Very comfortable large bed Near metro to central London Great shopping next door Parking with good access out of London

Negative_Review: I did not like the fact my window looked onto another room And the pillows were too soft I noticed a hole in the bedding sheet and a stain on the carpet
Positive_Review: Quiet hotel good facilities close to shops station restaurants

Negative_Review: The room had no balcony it was dusty wifi logged out constantly there was a party two nights we were there it wacko loud and kept us awake tea coffe in room was a joke we had to go to the local store to buy our own the breakfast was freezing we complained to no avail Not worth the money
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Bed was not comfortable at all pillows felt like bricks room cleanliness was awful literally had to call someone or leave a note to clean certain things such as new towels new beddings this was a big let down car park was 40 for stay of three nights would not tell us a cheaper car park however found one any way at just 5 pound for three nights 15 mins walking distance Only takes small things to build great customer service
Positive_Review: Great value for money walking distance from town and trains Had the leisure facilities so could go and use the pool the deck upstairs view was amazing nice and quiet and great rooms

Negative_Review: No Negative

Negative_Review: No Negative

Negative_Review: No Negative

Negative_Review: The shower was a bit of a let down and the tap over the bathroom sink seemed to be in the wrong place One of the towels was a bit grubby not as white as it should have been

Negative_Review: the room wasn t prepared when we arrived and had to wait until this was done despite arriving at 10pm long after expected check in time

Negative_Review: Free wifi but very poor signal so I used my phone s internet instead

Negative_Review: The breakfast buffet made us really sick My friend and I felt sick all through out the morning and afternoon We even threw up
Positive_Review: The room had a nice view

Negative_Review: The room was great but the bath tub had a few strands of long black hair clogging up the plughole which was very disappointing

Negative_Review: Nothing really is a big hotel and thus it was quite busy and crowded in the lobby However it wasnt too much of a problem

Negative_Review: Couldn t get the wifi to work but we didn t ask for assistance so wasn t necessarily their fault

Negative_Review: But far from tube expect free wifi in room in a 4 star hotel for this price fire fault meant disruption late at night evacuation had to move one room as water leak AC wasn t working in one room had to request a fix took several attempts to pay the correct room rate was being asked to pay more
Positive_Review: Location overall standard parking in gold car park was full but could park in red car park for same price sky bar excellent views of Wembley stadium good gym another bar on 3rd floor premium feel to hotel staff friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: That we paid for a room and could not get any peace because of a wedding party on a floor below which had the room shaking because of the noise and was informed that it would be finishing at 01 00 in the morning Not very happy Breakfast was good but the service was poor with the tea and coffee No questions asked on checkout to see if we enjoyed our stay poor
Positive_Review: Good size rooms and very clean

Negative_Review: Things too more work than necessary as the staff had trouble understanding us most likely due to northern accents but checking in ordering drinks etc was hard work Fire alarm went off at 10 30 pm took an hour before we were allowed back in no compensating for it what so ever Quite annoying for a multi billion pound company Rooms were nothing special for the extortionate price I know its London but we could of got better with a large branded company for less
Positive_Review: biscuits in the room were lovely cleaning staff were friendly

Negative_Review: We have to wait in the queue to check in and during check out We were given a room which has handicapped bathroom in it Not sure if that is normal as it is our first time stay in Hilton
Positive_Review: We liked the location and the staff were really helpfull

Negative_Review: No air con or openable windows is the only downside Very hot room after using hair appliances
Positive_Review: Really modern clean and stylish Lovely location too Close to bars restaurants and shops

Negative_Review: There was nothing to dislike
Positive_Review: The comfort cleanliness plush surroundings helpful staff It was our Anniversary whilst staying We booked a table at the Icon Bar Two tables were set for us one in doors one on the terrace due to weather forecast The service was outstanding the Bar Manager staff were great We got a free complimentary drink each they were making us a cake All staff were excellent throughout the hotel We even got a call to say our room was ready for early check in

Negative_Review: Hilton Hotel had no record of the booking made via booking com so registration took over 45 minutes Secondly Hilton hotel failed to allocate the room to me when booked in so that at 11pm at night another guest gained access to my room very poor

Negative_Review: It is a general observation but I hate to pay for breakfast In my opinion it is unfair and hotels could earn more money adding breakfast into a price of the room

Negative_Review: Actually just one minor thing the Wash Basin in the bathroom the tap is a bit too distant from the basin itself causing constant water spillage nothing major i guess but there you are this I feel can be looked into

Positive_Review: The hotel staff were amazingly helpful and friendly On the first morning of our stay a manager director was in reception asking customers if there was anyway in which he the hotel could help and was very happy to arrange for the hotel to chill our own bottle of fizz for when we returned that night When we got back to the room the bottle was in a bucket of ice with 2 glasses and a couple of strawberries perfect service

Negative_Review: The fire alarm went off because of a power cut and we weren t told it was a mistake until we had got dressed and made our way down the stairs

Positive_Review: We were attending a wedding in the grand ballroom and had a thoroughly enjoyable day
